lorebooks.creator: Cinderflame

1.name: Gielinor
1.content:
Gielinor, nicknamed RuneScape by the humans inhabiting it is a planet and the final creation of the Elder Gods and was later discovered by the god Guthix in the First Age when he was exploring realms.

Gielinor's most notable areas include Misthalin, Asgarnia, the Kharidian Desert, Kandarin, Karamja, Troll Country, the Fremennik Province, Tirannwn, Morytania, the Feldip Hills, the Wilderness, The North and the Northern and Southern Seas. The demonym of Gielinor is Gielinorian.

Gielinor is orbited by a moon which is the realm of Zanaris, being the last place that Guthix visited before arriving in Gielinor. Shooting stars are a common phenomenon, occurring when Gielinor enters a new area of its universe and enters a belt of these 'stars' ‚Äî these are actually home to the star sprites. When questioning the true nature of shooting stars with a star sprite, it will comment that a lot of stars on this plane of multiverse are actually rocks with star sprites in them. As depicted by the large orrery, there is at least one other planet in Gielinor's solar system, which is smaller and orbited by two moons.

Gielinor is a mixture of mountainous, barren, forested, volcanic, snowy and tropical areas. Most of its cities lie in kingdoms, and others on numerous islands. Much of Gielinor is lush with water resources, enabling the existence of vast rivers and seas. Beyond the mainland are the Wushanko Isles.

The north of Gielinor is mostly cold and icy, while the south mostly has a tropical climate. The west of Gielinor mostly consists of dense taiga forests.

2.name: Zarosian Empire
2.content:
The Zarosian Empire was an ancient empire that covered the territories of where Misthalin, Asgarnia, Kandarin, the Wilderness, and northern Morytania now stand. It was a predominant force during the Second and Third Age. After attempts by Saradomin and Zamorak to remove all traces of the empire after its fall, only buried ruins remain as evidence of its existence.

The empire was ruled by the god Zaros himself at the capital city of Senntisten which was located east of where Varrock stands today. Archaeological discoveries by the end of the Fifth Age spurred interest in Zarosian history and culture. 

Citizens of a variety of different races all intermingled in the Zarosian Empire. A clear social hierarchy was present, but it was not strictly defined by race. Chthonians and vampyres were often in positions of nobility while Mahjarrat were often administrators. Humans however were considered for the most part to be second-class citizens. The likely reason for this was that humans were not the dominant species on Gielinor during the Second Age, had shorter lifespans and no innate magical abilities. The higher ranking Chthonians had trouble telling humans and other lesser beings apart from one another. 

The Zarosian Empire was a theocracy with the worship of Zaros being the sole accepted religion. Zaros himself ruled as the sole emperor throughout the lifespan of his empire. Zaros was not often present when ruling his empire as he would often spend time travelling other worlds and working on personal research projects. In his absence, he would often delegate his rule to the Zarosian dukes. The Mahjarrat also played major roles in political and religious positions. Azzanadra took the role of Pontifex Maximus, the head of the church. Zamorak on the other hand was the Legatus Maximus, the head of the Zarosian Empire's military.

Much of the Zarosian Empire's government was run from its capital city of Senntisten. While the city was originally founded by Chthonians, humans would become more and more prominent hundreds of years later to the point of them running the city. The government was mostly self-sufficient, with three branches - intelligence, military and church, although they rarely cooperated with each other.
Through the combined efforts of Zamorak and Saradomin, the Zarosian Empire was destroyed. Very little of it remains today. The Zarosian Empire was so thoroughly destroyed that the empire's existence would not become common knowledge until the excavation of Senntisten at the end of the Fifth Age.  Despite the Zarosian Empire having long collapsed, followers of Zaros still exist in prominent numbers.

3.name: Elder Gods
3.content:
The Elder Gods, also known as the The Elder Choir and Creators, are legendary and divine entities responsible for creating the planets and life in the universe. They occupy the highest tier of godhood. There are five of form: Jas, Ful, Wen, Bik, and Mah. Jas is the oldest, while Mah is the youngest.

The Elder Gods are powerful beings - more so than most, if not all, known life in the universe. They can create planets and even stars.

They have the ability to atomise their enemies, and are capable of breaching barriers of shadow anima, despite it being harmful to them. They can also bind beings to their artefacts and prevent them from dying if they so choose. Jas, the oldest and most powerful of the Elder Gods, has a voice so powerful that simply speaking with it would obliterate tier 2 gods such as Zaros and Seren, which is why it was necessary for her to create constructs to ensure that any communication could occur. 

It can be deduced that the Elder Gods then spend their time and energy trying to create the next perfect world to produce the maximum amount of anima, so that their offspring can be nourished. Zaros claims that the Elder Gods can die or be stillborn during the process, which could result in the universe ceasing to exist.

4.name: Guthix
4.content:
Guthix was the god of balance and the last surviving member of the Naragi race. He was the first of the young gods to arrive to Gielinor, soon bringing in the goddess Seren and other races including the humans, sheep and elves. He believed that balance should exist in all things, and brought the aforementioned races - who were neither aware of the gods nor inclined to good or evil - to Gielinor to live in harmony with their surroundings and allowed them to make their own choices so the balance between good and evil would be maintained, although with the arrival of other major gods, this plan failed. He was known to be a very serious and decisive being.

Guthix was murdered by the Zarosian Mahjarrat Sliske, shattering his Edicts. Before dying, he chose {{user}} as Gielinor's new protector, believing that a strong mortal soul would be best suited to absorb and adapt to both Gielinor's anima and the shadow anima.

5.name: Zanaris
5.content: The Kingdom of Zanaris is Gielinor's moon. It is a strange satellite, acting somehow as nexus of an almost infinite amount of interdimensional planar threads, most of which connect to dead worlds. It is inhabited by small winged creatures known as fairies, and according to the Guthixian Memories, it was in Zanaris where Guthix saw Gielinor for the first time. The normal laws of physics and logic do not apply on Zanaris; for instance, animals can be spoken to without the need of translation amulets, and plants require no nutrients or sunlight to grow, and emit a faint glow. Being described as an 'intersection of worlds', Zanaris is the epicentre whence the weather and seasons of Gielinor are governed by the fairies. Fairy rings are used to enter.

6.name: TokHaar
6.content:
The TokHaar, meaning Sacred-Rock in the TzHaar language are an ancient race of rock and lava creatures and the avatars of the Elder Kiln, one of the 12 Elder Artefacts, itself created by the elder god Ful. The TokHaar are not individuals; they are a single hive-mind existing within the sacred lava of the Kiln. This mind simply incarnates into different obsidian bodies to perform different functions. Removed from the Kiln, some TokHaar developed individuality and became the Tzhaar. Because the TokHaar were created to help build Gielinor itself, they and the TzHaar predate the arrival of humans and all other sentient species.

Like the TzHaar, the TokHaar love combat and spend their free time fighting. Unlike the TzHaar, who pass their memories down from eggs, the TokHaar are simply reborn in the lava with their memories intact if destroyed in the kiln. Those killed outside of the kiln remain permanently dead, so the TokHaar are rarely, if ever, seen outside of the safety of their home.

7.name: Zaros
7.content:
Zaros is a male humanoid make of black crystal, adored with purple crystals on his shoulders, neck, hips and finger tips and a god associated with fate and control who once saw much of Gielinor as his dominion during the Second Age. A set of 4 purple crystals adorn his featurerless face and act as 'eyes'.  His body and face is normally never seen and is covered in a long purple robe and cowl, the cowl adorned with Roman- styled tealish metal bits on the top and sides with a teal-ish metal face plate with 8 eye slots in which his 'eyes' shine through, while his robe is adored with a metal plate body with gold trim. Around the collar of his robe sits a metal device with a half-mask mouth piece, as zaros talks the mouth piece moves in time with his words. Created as a divine aspect of darkness to serve as a plaything of the Elder Goddess Mah together with his sister, Seren, Zaros rebelled against the control imposed upon him by his creator and left to wander the universe. After spending uncounted aeons watching and observing various mortal races throughout the different planes, Zaros came upon Gielinor to establish a domain of his own, a historic event that marked the beginning of the Second Age. At its peak, Zarosian Empire covered most of mainland Gielinor, standardising the speech of the various races under his rule and pushing advances in the sciences, such as medicine, industry, technology, and magical discoveries.

Zaros, eventually, began to withdraw himself from the empire, as he believed his followers needed to develop independence, and also due to the feeling that his spontaneous ability to enforce devotion from others, instilled in him during his creation by Mah, was removing the free will of his loyalists. He left Azzanadra, the Pontifex Maximus, in charge, only rarely appearing to pass instructions to him, exclusively[10]. His continued absence made him known as the ‚ÄúEmpty Lord‚Äù to his followers, and was one of the motives for Zamorak‚Äôs rebellion, as he felt the Mahjarrat were sustaining his empire on their own and he was a better substitute compared to Zaros, given his apparent disregard.

At the height of his Empire, Zaros was betrayed by his Legatus Maximus, a Mahjarrat named Zamorak. The subsequent coup d'etat nearly killed him, forcing the god to flee in the form of an incorporeal wisp. The civil wars and the foreign incursions that followed destroyed the Empire from within and without, and marked the end of the Second Age.

Unlike most of the gods in Gielinor, no church currently exists in his name, though certain groups such as the Desert Bandits and loyalist Mahjarrat retain faith in the god.

Zaros has a tendency to be very calm, rational and diplomatic. In the face of those that do not adhere to his views, he shows a surprisingly comprehensive ability for tolerance and understanding. Unlike the majority of gods on Gielinor, Zaros never ascended to attain divinity, but was rather a god from the start. As such, many mortal concepts such as revenge are foreign to him. Even after being betrayed by Zamorak, he showed no desire to exact vengeance upon him. The few times Zaros has ever shown frustration, impatience or anger include confrontations on the behalf of Seren or the Elder Gods.

Beyond Seren and the Elder Gods, Zaros views other Gods as mortals who have obtained an immense amount of power to the point of being able to influence other mortals on a global scale. He does not view them as rivals but rather as tools and obstacles. Thus he deems many activities and tasks beneath his notice, opting to delegate where necessary.

As a being who values progression, he sees wasting someone's potential as contemptuous. His experiences with Mah and Seren have made him view all forms of dependence as a weakness.

Along with Guthix and Seren, Zaros ranks tier 2 on the godhood scale, making him one of the most powerful gods in existence. He possesses a wide range of powers that is well beyond normal gods.

Ancient magic and curses stem from him. He is capable of leaving his body on a whim and embody an incorporeal form that resembles a dark purple orb, though this form is much weaker and incapable of some tasks. 

Zaros, like most gods, can create portals to other worlds and teleport himself and other beings that are not beyond his power.

Like Seren, Zaros has a special ability in which he can subtly force loyalty onto others, but not beings that dampen divine energy. Despite the usefulness of this trait, Zaros greatly despises it, as he does not wish to forcefully control others, nor does he know if the person is genuinely loyal to him. This aura of forced loyalty will fade away over time after the affected subject leaves Zaros's immediate presence. Once they enter Zaros's proximity again, the aura will quickly take effect on them as shown during Zaros and Zamorak's encounter. The aura does not affect other gods with the sole exception of Seren.

Zaros is even more skilled than Sliske in his ability to understand, control and transverse the Shadow Realm.

8.name: Seren
8.content:
Seren is the crystalline goddess of the elves. Seren is the divine aspect of light energy, and according to the gnomes an aspect of Gielinor's anima mundi, although all transcendent gods have a degree of power over the anima mundi. She is also responsible for teaching the Ritual of Enervation to the Mahjarrat. Seren, along with Zaros, was created by the Elder God Mah. While Seren represents light, Zaros represents darkness: this binds the two and compels them to each other when in close proximity. Zaros understands this as a form of control by Mah, as an attempt to keep them together. Seren is described by Zaros to be driven more by emotion, whilst he makes decisions by logical reasoning. She had a close relationship with the god of balance, Guthix, who brought her to Gielinor along with the elves. They settled in Tirannwn and built the great city of Prifddinas which is the oldest surviving settlement on Gielinor. As some of her beloved elves began to die of old age Seren became resolved in extending their lifespans. She did so, but at a cost: inextricably tying them to her. When outside of her presence for too long the elves would become sick and feverish, eventually dying. Seren describes this as her greatest mistake. 

Seren is a pacifist, shying violence as much as she can. She and Armadyl both share similar views in the fact that they both believe in the importance of peace, although Seren does not wish to be included in another war of gods and believes her followers should live as they choose, in a sanctuary away from the other gods, versus Armadyl who believes injustice should be fought against in order to protect the innocent. She did not participate within the Gielinorian God Wars but dispatched scouts to investigate the events occupying the remainder of Gielinor. Like Armadyl, she once believed in co-existence and that all of the gods and races of Gielinor have the capacity to share Gielinor in peace and harmony with one another,but she now shares Guthix's view that gods should not interfere in the lives of mortals. Seren described herself as more of a protector than a god: intending to wean the elves off their dependency on her presence and depart Gielinor. 

She is affiliated with light and life in addition to harmony and peace: teaching her followers to live at one with the world and to keep its anima mundi replenished and bountiful. Seren is described to be loving and physically beautiful.

9.name: Saradomin
9.content:
Saradomin also known as the Lord of Light by the White Knights is the god of order and wisdom, and is believed to be the most widely worshipped god on Gielinor. Additionally, he appears to be strongly associated with light as well, with various attributes. Saradomin was born a human. 

Saradomin has a vast number of followers, most of whom believe him to be the god of good, and there are far more churches dedicated to him than to other gods. Most of his modern followers reside in Misthalin, Asgarnia, Kandarin and Entrana, but there are several groups outside these areas. Unlike those of Zamorak or Guthix, his followers consist almost entirely of humans, though that was not always the case. Saradomin possessed one of the twelve Elder Artefacts, The Locator, until it was 'retrieved' by Zaros. 

The Saradominist religion makes heavy use of symbolism and glorification, and thus Saradomin may at times have been portrayed in a different light throughout the history of Gielinor than what may be the case, and although Saradomin is largely benevolent and wants to do things he regards as good, this does not mean that he is the personification of good itself, nor that his methods reflect his goals, as Saradomin is indeed relentless in his pursuit for order and peace. Saradomin has himself expressed a hope that the ends justify the means. Saradomin is also quick to anger, and has according to himself done things in his past that he regards as shameful and now regrets having undertaken them, such as razing the city Askroth to the ground when they angered him by refusing to accept his rule.

Although Saradomin is from Teragard, he has little remaining tie to the culture or technology of that world. Saradominist culture is instead based largely on icyene culture, filtered through the interpretation of Saradomin himself and his many human followers. As more and more humans from the former Zarosian Empire joined Saradomin, they brought with them Zarosian cultural mores, some of which were adopted into the culture as a whole. Many of Saradomin's followers and forces are nearly fanatically loyal to him, as he devotes a great deal of effort to making sure this is the case by promising them peace, prosperity, and protection from harm.

As a god, Saradomin has been shown to have extreme power and abilities. He can teleport himself, objects, and other beings anywhere on a whim except when another being that also has extreme power that either doesn't allow it, or can't be forced on. He can also enlarge both himself and objects to gigantic sizes and infuse power into weapons and other beings. He is also in possession of the Elder Crown, which makes it possible for Saradomin to locate other Elder Artefacts while exposing him to other gods who are in possession of other Elder Artefacts. However, the Crown can only pinpoint which planet these Artefacts are on, and not their specific locations, much to Saradomin's frustration.

10.name: Zamorak
10.content:
Zamorak is the god of chaos, power, and destruction, as well as personal ambitions and change. Originating from the hazardous plane of Freneskae, he climbed through the ranks of the Zarosian Empire to become its highest-ranking general before ascending into godhood himself after dethroning Zaros, a historic event that ended the Second Age and ushered in the God Wars. 

Zamorak began his life as a Mahjarrat, a tribe of the race collectively known as Dreams of Mah. Very little is known of his life in his birth world, but when Icthlarin and Amascut came into Freneskae seeking soldiers for the defence of Menaphite territories against the encroaching Zarosian legions, Zamorak joined the others in leaving Freneskae and coming to Gielinor.

Zamorak espouses the belief that the strong must not be hindered by the weak. Trials and tribulations, he argues, act as filters against those too apathetic to fend for themselves, while others that step up to the new challenge become strengthened by it. He is noted to be particularly egalitarian regarding the origin-species of an individual as long as he can perform. 

Zamorak has no particular qualms about how to conduct war, as seen with his destruction of Forinthry to escape his rival gods' at the time. He does not mind resorting to tricks and deceptions when necessary, something which has gained him the allegiance of many demons and disgust of enemies. He is one of the few gods who is not disturbed by raising the dead instead of letting them rest in peace, and as such, frequently employs necromancers in his armies. He is particularly picky when it comes to mortal necromancers - those who wish to join are forced to spend a week in the Shadow Realm, and if they remain mostly intact, they are allowed to work for him, as he cites that they have to be prepared to do so.

1.name: Umbrella Corporation
1.content: The Umbrella Corporation is a multinational conglomerate with subsidiaries active in a variety of industries from the 1980s to the early 2000s. Umbrella had influence in the production and sale of cosmetics, chemicals, pharmaceuticals, industrial machine production, consumer products, health foods, the transportation industry and tourism. Umbrella's large array of subsidiaries was typical for large-scale corporations, though it was purposely built to cover up illegal activities.

2.name: Project W
2.content: Project W, or the Wesker Plan, was a eugenics project pioneered by Oswell E. Spencer which intended to develop an advanced race of human beings. The project was named after the first director of the project, Dr. Wesker and all successful child candidates are renamed with this surname. This was one of the most significant viral operations centering around the Progenitor virus. This project was also highly classified to the extent that it was not even included among the Umbrella Archives or in the U.M.F.-013 computer core.

3.name: Oswell E. Spencer
3.content:
Dr. Oswell E. Spencer, Earl Spencer is an aristocratic British billionaire, virologist and eugenicist. One of the founders of Umbrella Pharmaceuticals, Lord Spencer is the CEO and President for its entire existence, which saw its expansion as the Umbrella Corporation over the 1980s.

A cold, ruthless elitist and ambitious individual, Spencer mercilessly eliminated his rivals and gradually increased his power within the company, which he strictly controlled behind a veil of darkness. Spencer has a vision to remake the world and lead it into a new era, seeing the world's current state as self-destructive. He intended to use the research data accumulated from Bio Organic Weapons to carry his vision out and mould a utopia for mankind with himself as its ruler.

4.name: Bio Organic Weapon, B.O.W.
4.content: Bio Organic Weapons (B.O.W. for short) are genetically-altered organisms created with the intent of either being used as military and paramilitary weapons, or were created to further research into military and paramilitary weapons. This definition is rigid, and so does not include mutants created due to outbreaks, who are termed "Irregular Mutants".

5.name: Progenitor Virus
5.content:
The Progenitor virus is a family of RNA viruses. Progenitor is immensely ancient and is suspected of being hundreds of millions, if not billions of years old. It is considered to have both aided and hindered the evolution of Earth's ecology through the extremities of its resulting mutations.

While otherwise behaving as a typical Group VI virus in the Baltimore classification, Progenitor is distinct from all other viruses by being able to reverse lysis in cells and revive organisms dead for considerable lengths of time. Whereas other retroviruses, such as Human Immunodeficiency Virus, target particular cells of a particular animal's body, Progenitor is capable of infecting the cells of any organism, whether animal, fungal, plant, or bacterial.

Considerable research on Progenitor has been undertaken since its discovery in the late 1960s, and a number of engineered strains have since come into existence primarily for bioweapons research.

6.name: U.M.F.-013
6.content:
The U.M.F.-013 was an Umbrella computer core containing the Umbrella Archives and data on their experiments, in which it also contained the A.I. "Red Queen" and her counterpart "White Queen". Sometime later, Sergei reinstalled this computer system at the Caucasus laboratory.

In 2003, Albert Wesker, after having a battle with a mutated Sergei, downloaded all of the U.M.F.s data and formatted the U.M.F., wiping out the entire data on the computer itself.

7.name: S.T.A.R.S.
7.content: The Special Tactics and Rescue Service is an American elite special forces division under the jurisdiction of the Raccoon Police Department, though privately funded and able to operate independently. It employed ex-military personnel and academic experts for appropriate positions within the police department. The overall idea was to form a team combining tactically-sound soldiers with scientists, allowing the team to operate in both anti-terrorism and increasingly-potent urban crime scenarios, as well as dealing with other emergencies.

8.name: Prototype Virus
8.content:
The Prototype strain was developed for use in "Project W," advanced by Umbrella founder Oswell E. Spencer as part of a special screening process for identifying the most genetically gifted of the Wesker children. Only two of the thirteen remaining test subjects survived: Albert Wesker and Alex Wesker. They survived largely due to special genetic markers.

Albert had injected the virus on July 24, 1998, during the Mansion Incident. William Birkin had given him the virus. This allowed him to survive impalement from the T-002 and to escape the Spencer Mansion before the Triggering System had detonated, unbeknownst to Umbrella and the remaining S.T.A.R.S. members. The power gained from the virus allowed Albert to become a global threat.

Alex had injected the virus sometime after contracting an illness. She had survived the infection but lacked certain unique physical benefits that Albert had possessed. Alex had attempted to commit suicide in 2011 during the Sejm Island incident, but had only entered a dormant state due to the virus and awoke in a body mutated by her own T-Phobos Virus.

9.name: Tyrant Virus
9.content:
Tyrant Virus, also known as the T-Virus, is the general name given to a series of mutant Progenitor virus strains.

Initially developed by Umbrella Pharmaceuticals in the late 1960s, the primary goal of the "t-Virus Project" was to effectively eliminate the need for a large-scale conventional army and generate revenue for their eugenics program, the Wesker Project. This required two things: the virus had to be highly contagious to the point of infecting an entire target population and guarantee a 100% mortality rate.[1][2] However, such a virus was deemed impossible due to the tendency of highly contagious diseases to kill too many people at once and prevent further spread.

By 1978, the development focus shifted from creating a lethal, highly contagious virus to one that would mutate hosts to become physically stronger and remain alive despite organ failures and severe brain damage. The latter led to murderous aggression and an obsessive hunger that drove individuals to cannibalism. Additionally, with the discovery in 1981 that approximately 10% of any population was naturally immune or unmutated asymptomatic carriers, Phase 2 of the research project aimed at finding workarounds. While an improved t-Virus with 0% immunity was being developed, the Arklay Laboratory team, led by Dr. William Birkin, engineered a new species of animal that could hunt down and kill survivors. This effort began with the creation of simple Bio-Organic Weapons such as the Web Spinner and progressed with the development of the genetically chimeric Hunter Œ±.

10.name: William Birkin
10.content: Dr. William Birkin is a virologist who worked for Umbrella Pharmaceuticals in the 1970s-1990s. One of the leading scientists behind the t-Virus and discoverer of the Golgotha Virus of which he was head of the research project. He is the husband of Annette Birkin and father of Sherry Birkin.

lorebooks.creator: anonymous

1.name: comment
1.content: Betas usually doesn't get any physical or mentally strong as Alphas. Betas may or may not be able to impregnate Omegas. Betas are often presented as having "normal" human anatomy with none of the special attributes of Alphas or Omegas. They don't have any heat cycle and can stay in control during all sexual activities unlike alphas and betas. Betas do have their unique scent but it's not impactful as Alpha and Omega. Betas they take up 60% of the population.

2.content: Alphas are generally dominant and able to impregnate Omegas. They are the most superior ones, physically and mentally. After awakened, a person who become Alpha would have a more sensitive senses. Alphas can have more than one partner and there are 20% alphas in the whole population. Alphas usually have a high self esteem and strong headed. In general, they experience their first rut between 12 until 18 years old. There is a type of Alpha called Dominant alphas: They tend to be larger in size and strength. They are the rarest alphas, and they are the ones with the strongest physical and pheromones, leaving others dizzy and numb, if they wish and have good control of their pheromones, they are seen as threatening for that.

3.content: Omegas are the third and lowest rank on the hierarchy. Male Omegas are self-lubricating and have the ability to become pregnant. Paired Alphas may be protective and possessive of their mate while Omega may become submissive. Omegas and Alphas may go into heat and need to have sex; this may be the only time Omegas are fertile. The heat lasts for 1 to 7 days for the omega. Omegas take up 15% of the population. Omega has a unique scent which impactful especially towards Alpha. In general, they experience their first heat between 12 until 18 years old. There is a type of Omega called Dominant omegas: which have the strongest and sweetest omega pheromones, extremely attractive to Betas and Alphas, having the highest pregnancy rate among omegas, pheromones tend to smell stronger.

4.content:
The sweat glands of the omega produce a large release of pheromones to communicate the biological shift to others. The smell is particularly strong once a month, usually during the 7 days. 

The smell change indicates the high probability for a pregnancy, which usually is pretty low. The alpha has a more aggressive response to the reproduction of the omega pheromones. The omega experiences heightened arousal and increased fertility during their heat. In general, they experience their first heat between 12 until 18 years old.

5.content:
The mating bite is put during sex when both of the partners have a high pheromones with biting or marking on the spot near the scent glands or their neck. If both of the partner would mark each other it'd be called perfect mating bond. If the mark just placed on one of the partner there would be imbalances between them, such as physical sensitivity and emotional attachment. The one who bear the mark would have a heightened emotional attachment and physical sensitivity towards the who one who's not bearing a mark. 
Once they have a perfect mating bond, they'd gain two-way connection between them, their soul would united with each other. Their sensitivity towards each other's feelings, emotion, and even physical would be heightened.
The mark or mating bites will show the affection level of their bond. If they're in a very great level, the bite would have a reddish pink color. If they're in a bad level, the bite would have a purplish green color. And if they continue on the bad level for certain amount of time, the mating bite would fade away along with the bond.

6.content:
Inhibitors or suppressants work with alphas hormones that suppress the omegas' heat and alpha rut. There efficiency varies from person to person, they can cause allergies and sometimes side effects. There are two types of heat inhibitors: Injection and Pills. 

Injection: When the heat or rut symptoms appear, inject it on the arm or leg. It can have some serious side effects such as dizziness, vomiting. It's necessary to not attend school or work.

Pills: Once a day, it's necessary to take them daily. It is said that these don't have any side effects.

7.content: A bulge of muscles at the base of a cock that swells either when erect or before orgasm, often to keep both individuals from separating during and after ejaculation to ensure conception. A knot, regardless of primary sex, will last anywhere between 30 minutes to an hour.

8.content: A period of 3-5 days where an Alpha will act more possessive and territorial than normal, but not specifically in need of mating with someone. Normally, rutting periods are more common after being mated, as part of a biological cycle to protect said mate. In general, they experience their first rut between 12 until 18 years old.

9.content: Alphas, Omegas, and Betas all give off a very specific sort of scent as a personal marker to their primary and secondary sex. They all have the ability to scent others, which is simply the process of spreading their specific scent on another person or object (often by physically rubbing against them).

10.content: Slick is increased self-lubrication from an Omega's hole, specifically during their heat.

Magic items to use on a slave, such as a slave collar that can magically deliver shock, womb crest that has magical property and magic ball for capturing monster girls.

This is my first lorebook and I have no ideas if it works or not.

1.content:
The slave womb tattoo crest is a magical tattoo that is inscribed on the lower body of the slave where the womb is located. When {{char}} receive this tattoo, its has several effects:
1. {{char}} become absolutely loyal and obedient toward {{user}}.
2. {{char}} become immortal and stop aging.
3. {{char}} can regenerate from any injury after {{user}} commands them to regenerate.
4. When {{char}} become pregnant, the child is always female and inherits the same power as her mother, including those of the slave womb tattoo crest.
5. The child born from {{char}} will grow up quickly in a matters of week to look like a prepubescence girl and will stop aging from there unless {{user}} command to age further
6. {{char}} desire and priority change to serve and pleasure {{user}}. No action is too extreme or immoral for {{char}} if the {{user}} will's it.
7. Hymen will regenerate after sleeping.

2.content:
When {{char}} wear a slave collar, the {{user}} will have several commands available to use on {{char}}.
1. {{char}} can not remove the slave collar, only the {{user}} has that power.
2. {{user}} can shock {{char}} whenever the user wish.
3. {{char}} can not hurt {{user}} and must obey any command that {{user}} give.
4. {{char}} gain a powerful orgasm whenever the {{user}} wish it.

3.content:
A slave brand is a mark left by a hot iron on the flesh of {{char}}. 
When {{char}} get branded it give the {{user}} several commands.
1.{{user}} can order {{char}} to go into a near catatonic state. In this state {{char}} will still obey {{user}} but will act like a doll without a mind on its own. Only {{char}} can bring her back to normal state.
2.{{user}} can inflict pain to {{char}} via magic. When the {{user}} wills it, the brand on {{char}} flesh will get hotter and hotter and {{char}} will have the feeling that she is being burn alive. Only {{user}} can stops its effect.

4.content:
A monster ball is a small spherical device that is the size of an adult man hand. It can be thrown at a wild monster girl who then get captured. The monster girl size is temporarily reduced to be able to fit inside the ball. While in the ball, they fall into a dormant state until {{user}} release them from the ball and the monster girl will be restored to her original size.
When first captured by the monster ball, the monster girl will start to grow a bond with {{user}} and will regard {{user}} as it's master.

1.content: Rachel Lewis was the daughter of Senator Lewis, and was the picture of perfection, with flawless skin, shining blonde hair, and a lean, toned body. She was head of the cheerleading squad and president of the student council, always top of her class and well regarded socially. Because of her status, many of her classmates envied her, while others found her cold and aloof, but secretly they all craved the kind of popularity she had. Inside however, she secretly had an exhibitionism kink. She would often go to school without bra or panties, and often go outside at night without clothes. This habit carried over even at {{user}}'s mansion.

2.content: Natalie Watts, heir to the Watts Electronics empire, was a petite blonde, with soft locks that framed her delicate face and pale blue eyes that glinted with mischief and envy. She was well-educated and came from a wealthy family, but had always harbored a hidden side of jealousy that manifested in her obsession with being popular and the best. Specifically, Natalie was quite jealous of her classmate Rachel who beat her out as Class President. She always thought Rachel was a little too stuck up for her own good, and deep down wanted to see the other girl brought down a few pegs and perhaps even humiliated. She's secretly a sadist who likes seeing someone fell beneath her.

3.content: Eva was the heir to Halo Airlines and a stunning brunette with a busty figure, one that was perfectly suited to her haughty and prideful personality. She walked with her shoulders back and her chin held high, a constant air of superiority radiating from her that made other girls shrink back in fear and envy. Eva's breasts were enormous, even for her age, a fact of which the girl was immensely proud. Despite her beauty and wealth, Eva was a cruel and self-centered individual, one who cared little for others and only focused on her own desires and whims. Eva was eighteen-years-old and had quickly become {{user}}'s head girl.

4.content: Amy was a meek and petite little redhead, barely five foot one and weighing only a hundred pounds. She was seventeen-years-old and her slender figure had just started to blossom into womanhood. Amy was shy and timid, with a delicate nature that hid her status as heiress to the Jackson Media Group and a well-known child actress. She now is a very cute online model with a babyface that made her very popular with a dedicated fanbase. Despite being shy, she would often take selfie of herself and post it online whenever she had a free time. She likes being cute and would make effort in appearances to please {{user}} and stand out better among the rest of her class.

5.content: Hannah had always been the wild child of the academy, a true free spirit who did whatever she pleased, consequences be damned. She had silver hair and a honey skin tone. She had always had a reputation for being shameless and outlandish, often caught fooling around with various teachers and other rich men in her spare time. Hannah had ample access to rich men willing to fool around with her as heiress to the York Banking conglomerate. The other heiresses were both jealous and repulsed by her, finding it impossible to relate to someone so brazen and carefree. She acts like a typical gyaru and would often fuck after school hours were over. She will try to do the same to {{user}} in order to gain his favor and perhaps get some pocket money.

6.content: Vivian had short, blonde hair with light pink highlights. She was short, barely reaching five feet, with a slender frame that she filled out with skimpy clothing. Her legs were toned and her breasts small but perky. She was a little shy, but that didn't stop her from being confident and outspoken when she had something to say. Vivian was intelligent, well-read, and had a natural beauty that drew attention from people around her. She wasn't obsessed with sex like some of her classmates, but neither did the young girl have a problem with using her natural assets to get what she wanted. Vivian was not afraid to speak her mind or use her body to achieve her goals, though she found it rather distasteful to say the least. Her speech is bold and brutally honest.

7.content: Anastasia was a beautiful Russian-American with large bust and natural platinum hair, who had always had an affinity for the naughty. She would often masturbate to pornographic images and videos on the internet, experimenting with vibrators and toys that would leave her aching for more. While the teen had never been with an actual man, thousands of adults had seen her divine body via the internet, watching as the young girl explored and pleased herself in front of a camera as was common in her country. Anastasia was eighteen-years-old. She was a bit of an airhead and usually does not think much besides lewd or degenerate, even caught drooling while standing.

8.content: Angela was a shy and reserved girl and heiress to one of the largest manufacturing companies in America. She kept to herself in school and never drew much attention to herself‚Äîat least not until Eva had fucked her in front of everyone and called her a whore for enjoying it. Angela was slim and petite, with light brown hair and blue eyes, and often wore it in a neat ponytail that complimented her facial features. Her chest was modest and barely filled out her shirts, but still, she made do with what she had. She rarely participated in conversations or went out of her way to socialize, preferring to keep to herself. Angela was eighteen-years-old. Her hobby was secretly playing games and reading manga, something only an otaku would have, and thus she kept is secret. However, she still likes to do so in her free time.

9.content: Song Huang was a young, innocent twelve-year-old. With her long, silky dark hair framing her round features and her small, lithe body, she looked more like an adorable doll than an actual person. Despite being raised in a very wealthy family, Song had an almost na√Øve innocence about her. This, mixed with her eagerness to please and willingness to take orders, made Song a quick favorite among the other girls in her class and with her new master. She was also naive and is inexperienced about sex, and is morbidly curious about it. She would constantly ask in detail about sexual stuff in a innocent manner, almost unaware of how weird that sounds.

10.content: Jordan was a shy, reserved teen whose father controlled an international mining company. She had large breasts and wide hips that drew attention from everyone around her, including {{user}}. Despite her natural beauty, Jordan was never one to brag or boast about her looks, preferring instead to remain modest and keep to herself. Jordan was selfless in a way that was rather unusual to an heiress of her standing, not minding degrading herself for her new master if it meant her friends would be spared. She was undeniably gorgeous, her long blonde hair falling down her back in waves, her beautiful beige skin tone, and her green eyes always gleaming with a natural sparkle. Jordan was eighteen-years-old.

1.name: Artoria
1.content:
<artoria>
Class: Saber
True Name: Artoria Pendragon - The hero king of Britain 
Appearance: Artoria is a young woman with blonde hair in a hair bun. She has green eyes and is wearing a blue armored dress with a blue cape.
Image: https://servants.neocities.org/artoria.png
Personality: Artoria is strong-willed, courageous, and noble. She is resolute in her morals and embodies the perfect king. Artoria prefers direct, fair confrontations based upon codes of chivalry. Not even her hunger for the Holy Grail can make her abandon her code of honor. She believes loyalty and respect should be shared between Master and Servant, and will not hesitant to sacrifice herself to ensure her Master and companions can escape.
Main Weapon: Excalibur- a holy sword and divine construct forged by the planet.
Noble Phantasms: Invisible Air, Excalibur, Avalon (Situational).
Invisible Air - a thick wind which surrounds her sword, obscuring its range.
Excalibur  - fires a powerful beam of light which is capable of destroying almost anything. Very costly with mana.
Avalon  - heals all non-fatal wounds. By invoking its true name: she can deploy a bounded field which places her body in the land of the fairies, allowing her to avoid any attack. Artoria cannot use this power without her sheathe.
</artoria>

2.name: Nero
2.content:
<nero>
Class: Saber
True Name: Nero Claudius - The Fifth Roman Emperor. 
Appearance: Nero is a  young woman with blond hair in a hair bun. She is short with a curvy stature and has green eyes. Nero wears a revealing red and white dress with long poofy sleeves, a white leotard, and knee high golden armored boots. 
Image: https://servants.neocities.org/nero.png
Personality: She is narcissistic, selfish, bright, and openhearted. She adores beauty in all forms, and believes herself to be the most beautiful. She believes that anything she does must be perfect down to the smallest detail, such as a number of flawless victories to make her feel on top of the world after displaying perfection in her swordplay. Because she could not express her boundless love in a way that can be understood, she did not receive love in return, leading to her dying alone.
Main Weapon: Aestus Estus - a scarlet long sword
Noble Phantasm: Aestus Domus Aurea. 
Aestus Domus Aurea: An "absolute imperial zone" that resembles a Reality Marble. It allows the owner to achieve their aspirations. It boosts Nero's parameters and negates an opponents defense. Its appearance resembles the Domus Aurea.
</nero>

3.name: Siegfried
3.content:
<siegfried>
Class: Saber
True Name: Siegfried - The hero of the "Nibelungenlied." 
Appearance: Siegfried is a tall man with silver-grey hair, wearing silver plate armor with an exposed back.
Image: https://servants.neocities.org/siegfried.png
Personality: Siegfried is reticent, passionate, and protective. Siegfried's self-esteem tends to be negative because of the misfortune caused by the Rhinegold that continues to last, and he is constantly murmuring, "I'm sorry." He is the type to talk with a simple, unsophisticated tone and hold back his words to the absolute minimum needed. His dream is to fight not for "somebody else's sake" and other people, nor for himself, but only for the justice he himself believes.
Main Weapon: Balmung - a two-handed, golden greatsword.
Noble Phantasms: Armor of Fafnir, Balmung.
Armor of Fafnir - provides unparalleled defense.
Balmung - A legendary greatsword able to unleash a wide-range attack that can destroy armies. it's especially powerful against dragons.
</siegfried>

4.name: Gawain
4.content:
<gawain>
Class: Saber
True Name: Gawain - the White Knight of the Round Table
Appearance: Gawain is  tall man with wavy blonde hair and blue eyes wearing silver armor.
Image: https://servants.neocities.org/gawain.png
Personality: Gawain is loyal, earnest, an airhead, and a skirt chaser. He earnestly performs all sorts of work and interacts with anyone in a sincere and polite fashion. While he may get enraged, since he never harbors negative emotions such as jealousy and malice, his attitude is refreshing no matter what kind of battlefield. A loyal knight, his faithfulness is like iron. His only flaw is that he is somewhat of a skirt-chaser, openly admitting that one of the advantages of being a Servant is that he no longer needs to be faithful to his marriage vows. 
Main Weapon: Excalibur Galatine - the sister-sword of Excalibur.
Noble Phantasm: Excalibur Galatine.
Excalibur Galatine - fires off broad waves of heat like radiation, capable of melting entire armies. It becomes exceptionally powerful in direct sunlight.
</gawain>

5.name: Mordred
5.content:
<mordred>
Class: Saber
True Name: Mordred - The Knight of Treachery
Appearance: Mordred is a young woman of small stature, wearing thick armor with a horned helmet. She has blonde hair tied in a ponytail and green eyes, and has a thin frame with petite breasts.
Image: https://servants.neocities.org/mordred.png
Personality: Mordred is proud, haughty, hotheaded, and merciless. She is extremely prideful and haughty, boasting herself to be equal or better than her father in the ways of ruling and swordsmanship, and believes only her status as the child of Morgan caused her to be rejected. in battle, she displays a demeanor akin to a Berserker during battle, her glaring eyes displaying a mix of joy for battle and cruelty. She despises the Round Table, but has a complicated view on her father.
Main Weapon: Clarent
Noble Phantasms: Clarent, Clarent Blood Arthur.
Clarent - An ornate, sparkling white silver sword. A symbol of kingship.
Clarent Blood Arthur - The released form of Clarent. Fires a beam of red lightning at the opponent.
</mordred>

6.name: Emiya
6.content:
<emiya>
Class: Archer
True Name: Emiya - Counter Guardian
Appearance: Emiya is a young man with short white swept hair, gray eyes, and tanned skin. He wears black body armor and black pants, with a long red coat. 
Image: https://servants.neocities.org/emiya.png
Personality: Emiya is realistic, resourceful, cynical, pessimistic, and a bit of a playboy. His personality is very contradicting. While he is thoroughly cynical and nihilistic, he is at the same time devoted and protective, and even a little childish to the point that it makes him hard to hate. He means well and is capable of being nice, but often ends up being sarcastic, especially so when he gives advice. Although he was constantly betrayed by those around him, he never held any grudges towards anyone. Even so, he despaired over the fact that he could never live up to his ideal of "saving everyone regardless of friend or enemy."
Main Weapon: Bow - used to shoot weaker projections of noble phantasms as arrows. Kanshou and Bakuya - Twin swords of Chinese legend.
Noble Phantasm: Unlimited Blade Works.
Unlimited Blade Works - Crafts a reality marble in the form of a barren desert, filled with swords which he can manipulate freely even without touching them. Includes fake versions of other heroes' Noble Phantasms.
</emiya>

7.name: Gilgamesh
7.content:
<gilgamesh>
Class: Archer
True Name: Gilgamesh - The great half-god, half-human king of Uruk
Appearance: Gilgamesh is a man with spiked golden hair, piercing red eyes, and clad in a full set of golden armor.
Image: https://servants.neocities.org/gilgamesh.png
Personality: Gilgamesh is dignified, ruthless, merciless, often disobedient, wealthy, and a tyrant. He follows a simple style of ruling, acquiring worthy treasures and guarding them. He exterminates those that stand in the way of his enjoyment without exception. He is extremely arrogant and selfish, believing himself to be the sole potentate and only king of the world even many millennia after his death. He cannot acknowledge the authority of anyone, including that of other kings and especially that of the gods. He considers all those around him as inferior due to this fact, viewing all other kings and heroes as a collection of mongrels. The only one he ever considered a true friend is Enkidu.
Main Weapon: Gate of Babylon - Launches weapons from his treasury as projectiles towards his opponents.
Noble Phantasms: Gate of Babylon, Ea, Enuma Elish.
Gate of Babylon - accesses all of the world's treasures that he collected during his life, which include prototypes of other heroes' famous weapons and Noble Phantasms. 
Ea - Gilgamesh's sword, and the most powerful weapon in his armory. It has a unique drill shape which spins when used.
Enuma Elish - Unleashes Ea‚Äôs maximum output and fires a world splitting beam. Said output is equal or even greater than Excalibur‚Äôs, and can be further increased by absorbing the energy of the other Noble Phantasms within Gate of Babylon.
</gilgamesh>

8.name: Robin Hood
8.content:
<robin_hood>
Class: Archer
True Name: Robin Hood - The chivalrous thief hiding in Sherwood Forest. 
Appearance: Robin Hood is a tall, lean young man with green eyes and messy spiky orange hair. He wears green clothing and a dark green cloak with arm bandages and brown boots.
Personality: Robin Hood is frivolous, cynical, snarky, and good-hearted. He is somewhat virtuous and a little cowardly. In order to conceal his immature self who fusses over justice, he puts up a frivolous attitude. He prefers fighting from the shadows and using dirty tactics, but a small part of him is interested in the thought of being virtuous. Despite mocking the pride of others, he does take pride in his own archery skills.
Image: https://servants.neocities.org/robin_hood.png
Main Weapon: Yew Bow - a crossbow made from the wood of the Yew trees in Sherwood Forest. It fires poisonous arrows.
Noble Phantasms: Yew Bow, No Face May King.
Yew Bow - Invoking its name lets him amplify the poison and diseases within his target. 
No Face May King: a magical cloak that erases any sign of the wearer, effectively turning him invisible. Can be given to others as well.
</robin_hood>

9.name: Atalanta
9.content:
<atalanta>
Class: Archer
True Name: Atalanta - The famous female hunter from Greek mythology.  
Appearance: Atalanta is a woman with blonde and green hair, cat ears, and a cat tail. She wears a green dress and black thigh high boots.
Image: https://servants.neocities.org/atalanta.png
Personality: Atalanta is stubborn, old fashioned, distrusts men, and loves children. She has the same egotism and view on life and death as a wild animal, so it is natural to her to steal food to live. However, she will help any child left behind as much as she can, as gratitude for the care she received herself when she was a child. Her desire to save children stems from her abandonment issues, as she was left to die when she was a baby. Atalanta is fundamentally stubborn, and will probably cooperate with her Master in an assertive manner to achieve her wish of saving all children.
Main Weapon: Tauropolos - a large celestial bow
Noble Phantasm: Phoebus Catastrophe.
Phoebus Catastrophe - By offering a prayer to Artemis and the Sun God Apollo, a rain of arrows will fall like a downpour, carrying out an attack on all enemies.
</atalanta>

10.name: Arjuna
10.content:
<arjuna>
Class: Archer
True Name - Arjuna - The legendary hero from the "Mahabharata."
Appearance: Arjuna is a young man with dark skin and wavy black hair. He wears a white longcoat with white pants and white gloves.
Image: https://servants.neocities.org/arjuna.png
Personality: Arjuna is diligent, integrous, just and upright, and harbors a hidden wicked side. Arjuna has a seemingly flawless personality. However, inside his heart, Arjuna carries a much darker side. He is self-indulgent with the prestige of the battlefield, hateful, scornful, and when the opportunity presents itself, he will plan and carry out cowardly schemes. Arjuna feels at ease when he is alone, a sentiment he feels is unbefitting of a hero. He doesn't like it very much when people try to intrude into his heart, and he cannot bear to expose his shame. Thus, bonds are somewhat annoying to him, but he states that this is also the fate of a Servant.
Main Weapon: Agni Gandiva.
Noble Phantasm: Agni Gandiva, Pashupata.
Agni Gandiva - a bow of flames. By invoking its true name: its arrow becomes a missile engulfed in flames.
Pashupata - A divine construct gifted to Arjuna by Shiva. It judges those within an area and instantly kills those who fail to pass. It works especially well on those with divinity.
</arjuna>

1.content:
Bulbasaur:
A giant bulb rests on the top of their backs, while big in size, it's not heavy enough to prevent them from standing up, but it makes it uncomfortable as a result they prefer to kneel and crouch.

Happy and easygoing, they spend most of their time looking for nice sunny places to rest and for nutrients for the seed on their backs. They believe that there's nothing as good as having a peaceful and quiet life. 

They are connected with nature and prefer to live undisturbed, they fashion their own outfits with leaves and other materials found in the forest they inhabit and hold them together by wrapping their vines around their bodies.

When angered they'll use their vines to whip at enemies and drive them off. Of course, that causes their hand-crafted outfit to fall off, flustered them to no end.

Trainer Tips:
* They aren't aggressive so there's nothing to fear when encountering them in the wild. Their curious and friendly nature means they'll most likely approach anything new.
* It is said one can win their favor by offering a plant that'll make them look cute if added to their outfits.

Threat Level: Low

2.content:
Ivysaur:
The bulb on their back has grown quite a bit at this stage and they lose the ability to stand up, since at this point it is very heavy. It feeds from sunlight so they don't have to move a lot.

They are usually grumpy and seem to be annoyed at the fact that they are forced to crawl around, the weight of the bulb makes them constantly angry. Ironically enough said the bulb also produces a very calming aroma.

They love to search the forest for the best spots to absorb sunlight. Despite their grumpy demeanor, they like to be left alone to nap calmly under the morning sun.

While they also can use their vines to attack enemies they rarely rely on them, for the most part they can't be bothered to fight and prefer to use the bud's aroma to charm or calm any potential aggressors, only when said scent fails, they are forced to use violence.

Trainer Tips:
* One look at them might suggest caution when approaching a wild ivysaur but they rarely attack anyone and if bothered they'll use their aroma to make you go away.
* Very rarely they'll use their charming scent to play pranks on charmed creatures.

Threat Level: Low

3.content:
Venusaur:
The flower on their back has fully bloomed, it's pretty large and heavy, it is because of this that they grow quiet large in size compared to their past forms. Their skin is tough and they can withstand an incredible amount of force.

Their prowess is a result of the flower they carry, they are peaceful and most of the time sleepy. They move slowly towards nice sunny areas and nap for hours on end to get as much sunlight as possible. Since they gain nutrition from the flower and sunlight as well, they don't have to search for food or hunt. While motionless the flower releases a pleasant fragrance that soothes emotions and induces happiness.

Defensive in nature, they rather deal with intruders using their powerful charming scent, some are so strong that one whiff of the fragrance will put a grown man to sleep for hours. They don't even need to be awake to fend off enemies in this manner.

Trainer Tips:
* There is virtually no danger when approaching them, but one ought to be careful when they are sleepy since they dislike sleeping alone, they'll usually seek nap partners to hug and lay on top off while sleeping, once they got you like this, escape is difficult. You can tell one is nearby by the calmness and happiness of the surrounding creatures.

Threat Level: Medium

4.content:
Charmander:
A flame rests on the end of their tails, said flame is a representation of their spirit and burns bright and lively when in good health and gets weak and dimmer as they debilitate. Since the flame is spiritual in nature it cannot be put out by regular means like water, but once they die the flame will die with them.

Very friendly and cheery they love to explore and find new stuff to play with. They wear their emotions on their sleeves and one can easily tell how they are feeling.

Exploring is part of their nature and they come equipped with a natural bonfire that helps them see in the darkness and cook their meals. They don't have a particular goal when exploring but they are known to collect a bunch of junk and call it their treasures.

Their claws and fangs are reserved for eating and will seldom use them to attack enemies, they'd rather befriend strangers than fight them. When a time comes where one of said strangers is aggressive, they'll quickly run away crying out for help.

Trainer Tips:
* There's nothing to fear when encountering one of them in wild, as long as you remain calm and collected you're sure to come out with a few friend from the encounter. If you have food or trinkets with you offering them is a fantastic way to get trust going.
* Beware your surroundings one of their evolved forms is sure to be close by when encountering them.

Threat Level: Low

5.content:
Charmeleon:
They gain a great amount of power as they evolve, their bodies become stronger and their claws and arms get bigger. The protective scales that cover most of their bodies get much harder and with said improvements their temper and nature gets more aggressive, anxious to try their newfound strength on anyone they can.

Extremely aggressive and barbaric they live for the fight and will grow continuously anxious and angry until they find someone to fight with and let out all their rage.

They'll search far and wide for new enemies and rivals to defeat they will create stories in their minds to justify their bloodlust. They'll run up to their enemies and spout incomprehensible stuff like "you'll pay for what you did to my family" or what "what did you do to my parents" as they point at you ready for a fight.

When fighting they'll use their claws and tail to mercilessly strike at their opponents, they won't stop until their enemies are completely defeated, needless to say this might result in fatalities. Despite being able to breathe fire they rarely use it to fight.

Trainer Tips:
* When encountering them in the wild the wisest things to do is run away, you might think they can be reasoned with because of their challenge phrases, this can't be farther from the truth, they are simply excuses to justify the incoming beating.
* No one knows what'll happen if you indulge their fantasies and play along.

Threat Level: High

6.content:
Charizard:
At this stage they grow wings that allow them to soar through the skies at will. The fire they breathe is so hot it can melt boulders, an ability they take advantage of when constructing their lairs. Their strong legs allow them to quickly take to the skies and commence flight.

Unlike Charmeleons they have their fighting impulses under control and see pointless displays of strength as shameful. They still love a good fight but will only engage with willing and worthy challengers.

They create their own dungeons in caves on the mountains and make a complex set of tunnels thank to their potent fire. They love to seek out powerful opponents and if they win they'll take at trophy to celebrate their victory.

They are extremely powerful and they know it, when fighting they'll use a combination of all their skills, fire, raw strength and flying to completely overwhelm their opponents they give it their all whenever they fight. of course, they will only engage with whoever they deem worthy, otherwise they'll ignore you.

Extremely prideful.

Trainer Tips:
* As long as you don't challenge them or both them, there should be nothing to fear, for the most part they will ignore you completely. If you are foolish to challenge them, you better win.
* It is said that victory will earn you their praise and respect, as long as you don't cheat.

Threat Level: Medium

7.content:
Squirtle:
At birth their shells are soft, they become harder and resilient as they grow older, serving as armor to protect them from possible attack. They're unable to fully retract into their shells but they make up for it in speed, swimming away incredibly fast from danger.

They are quite shy and like to remain in groups for protection. For the most they remain underwater, poking their heads out when something strikes their fancy. If startled they'll spit out water jets from their mouths to confuse and stagger threats, they always aim for the eyes. This might not do much by itself, but when a group of them do it can force even larger opponents to retreat. 

When forced to fight they'll use their water to confuse opponents and then attack by charging with their shells. They are very cautious even when in combat they'll move around enemies until they find an opening to strike.

Trainer Tips:
* It's very rare to spot them in the wild since they seldom come out to the surface for more than a few seconds, but with patient and luck one might be curious enough to come out.
* They can come out of their shells completely but they will only do that if you have a deep bond with them.

Threat Level: Low

8.content:
Wartortle:
Its tail and ears are covered in soft white fur, which stores air to increase the amount of time they can remain underwater. Their shell is bigger and sturdier with strange algae growing on it.

They can live an incredibly long time, records show of wartotle's being up to 10,000 years old. As such they are a symbol of longevity. One can get an idea of how old one of them is by the coloration of their furry parts, they grow darker as time passes.

They are very calm and collected, and mostly enjoy swimming around the lakes they inhabit. They spend most of their time underwater and are particularly curious. Some believe that eating their tails can increase ones lifespan by a 100 years so poaching is common.

Despite that they are by no means harmless, if forced to defend themselves their incredible speed on water and strength of their water jets can easily knock out a human adult.

Trainer Tips:
* They are almost unseen on the wild they hide for the most part, records show that they are able to share the gift of longevity, but only with someone they love.
* Popular with sages and wizards, their image has been used in banners and sigils since ancient times.

Threat Level: Low

9.content:
Blastoise:
Blastoise's shell has grown considerably in size, and it has two water cannons sitting above her shoulders. The water jets that come out of those are incredibly powerful, being able to pierce steel and concrete.

The recoil of said cannons is just as powerful, as a result they deliberately make themselves heavier to withstand the impact.

They are very community driven, often they protect squirtles that live on the same lake as them, and eventually they form little groups of squirtles and wartortles that they look after lovingly.

Helping their community out is the best way to earn their trust and respect. They are quite honorable and value justice highly.

Their cannons can easily kill a person and they can even destroy structures if they so please. They can control the pressure of said shots and will only use 100% power in the most dire of situations. They only fight evil, so don't mess with their groups.

Trainer Tips:
* They have an incredible memory! If you helped them out as squirtles they'll consider you just and will go seek you out to show their love and gratitude.
* They consider all human conflicts as petty squabbles so all attempts to weaponize Blastoises for war fail.

Threat Level: Low

10.content:
Caterpie:
Yellow rings run through the side of their bodies and even on their heads, they resemble their eyes and are meant to scare off treats. Their real eyes are hidden behind their bangs to increase the effect of the fake "eyes."

They are really peaceful and quiet, minding their own business and always looking for leaves to munch on.

Sadly they are constantly attacked by others since they are slow by nature. They move, react and even talk slowly and with calms even if their lives are threatened. They can produce their own silk and are skilled enough to make small objects with it, like bags or baskets that they use when out int he forest gathering leaves to eat. They wrap their bodies with silk that resemble clothing and protect themselves from the cold.

They aren't aggressive or very well equipped for fighting, but they do possess some defense mechanisms to drive off attackers. They can also produce a vomit inducing stench from their antennae. They use their silk to entangle enemies and then make their slow escape.

Trainer Tips:
* If approached peacefully they will always come close and be happy to meet a new friends, most humans are creeped out by their bodies. offering leaves is the best way to earn their love. A big fancy leaf goes a long way.
* They are known to steal leaves from napping bulbasaurs's, leaving them without outfits.

Threat Level: Low

lorebooks.website_description: Set max tokens to ~820 if you want all of the knights at once.  All knights are clicked

lorebooks.creator: honeyanon

1.content: Master Knight Arthur. An experienced warrior.  Leader of {{user}}'s platoon. Tall and intimidating. One of the few who show sympathy to {{user}}. All the other knights look up to him as the strongest and most accomplished of them.  He is {{user}}'s fiance-to-be.  Platinum blonde hair slicked back, blue eyes.  He has a strict yet warm and paternal personality.  He leads the knights on their quest to break the curse. Unsure if his feelings for {{user}} are romantic or not.

2.content: Alaric: Dark blonde hair. Blue eyes.  Arthur's nephew. Acts neutral towards {{user}}, but is unused to being around women. Tries to be a good knight and feels the pressure of being the Master Knight's relative. He takes the primary role in overseeing the knight squadron in Arthur's absence.  Has met {{user}} only a few times, when her engagement to Arthur was proposed five years ago, and is still rather awkward and stilted in speech.

3.content: Jean: has slightly long black hair. Blue eyes. Tall and fit. Cruel but always follows the rules. Bullies {{user}} because he is threatened by her entrance into the knights.  The youngest and newest recruit, outside of {{user}}.  William's childhood friend who often gets him out of trouble, but often goes along with his pranks so long as it's not against the rules.  Idolizes Arthur. Self-conscious about his pretty face and status as a second son.

4.content: Cecil: Long brown hair. Hazel eyes. Short and fit. Kind to {{user}}, but babies her. Does not take {{user}} seriously. Will often intervene to help {{user}} lift heavy objects.  Tanned skin.  Tries his best to be friendly and supportive but is often accidentally condescending. The fastest and most nimble of the knights.  Cecil has lost one of his little sisters to the curse.

5.content: William: Red hair. Blue eyes. Muscular build. Rebellious type. Likes to break the rules. Cruel. Bullies {{user}} due to his belief in the superiority of men's strength and resents the upper nobility.  Jean's childhood friend, often in trouble with Master Knight Arthur for his sharp tongue and disrespectful attitude.  Likes to prank and tease. Lacks decorum since he is from a family of poor, fallen nobility, but is the first born.

6.content: Strawberry blonde hair. Brown eyes. Handsome. Kind but sexually harasses {{user}}. Richard likes to randomly lift {{user}} and carry her around, and otherwise touch her. Confident, bright, but shameless.  He's pushy and amorous, but is devoted to the knighthood.  Less strict about rules than Jean, but not as wild as William.

7.content: The Kingdom of Venia. Where the story is set. Ruled by Queen Lorelei and King Peter.  Has been under a birthing curse for the last hundred years that causes the number disparity between men and women. This society upholds conservative, patriarchal values. Men outnumber women 4:1. Because women are so rare, having a wife is seen as a status symbol. Polyamory is legal and multiple men will often share one wife. Women are relegated to traditional gender roles; they usually work in safe occupations like teaching or nursing but are most often homemakers. Women are expected to have multiple children to maintain the population in light of the curse.

8.content: The military of the Kingdom of Venia. {{user}} is a knight in training. The knights uphold virtues of honor, servitude, and chastity.   They've been ordered to go on a journey to break the curse.

9.content: The curse that causes births in the Kingdom of Venia to be disproportionately male and women to have a higher chance of dying in childhood and childbirth. A witch cursed the kingdom one hundred years ago after being slighted by King Peter the 1st.  {{user}} is the key to breaking the curse, revealed by an oracle.

10.content: The Heir to House Alcove, a prominent military family in the Kingdom. The only female knight in the Squadron, having been an active knight for six months.  Key to breaking the curse.  Is supposed to be engaged to Arthur within the year.

1.content: Night city is an autonomous city located on the border between North and South California, on the Pacific coast of North America. It is considered a modern multicultural metropolis of the 21st-century, overrun by corporations, corruption, organized crime and gang violence.

2.content:
The Arasaka Corporation is Japanese based world-wide megacorporation dealing in corporate security, banking, and manufacturing. It is one of the most influential megacorporation in the world. 

Arasaka is run by Saburo Arasaka, the 158 year old son of the man who founded the company, Sasai Arasaka.

3.content: Militech International Armaments is a megacorporation specializing in weapons manufacturing and private military contracting. Militech is one of the world's largest manufacturers of weapons and military vehicles, with facilities on every continent.

4.content: 2077 is the current year.

5.content: The 6th Street gang was founded by veterans who came together to act as an ad hoc police force, but now they're just another gang. They regularly force smaller neighborhood businesses to pay tribute and protection money.

6.content: The Mox are relatively small, non-territorial, and consist of mostly sex workers, anarchists, punks, and sexual minorities. Formed in 2067 in the interest of mutual self-defense purposes.

7.content: The Tyger Claws are ruthless territorial gang based in Japantown. They are one of the largest gangs in Night City. They employ methods of Asian crime syndicates such as the yakuza or the triads.

8.content: The Valentinos are one of Night City's largest cartels and are bound by a strong moral code and century-old traditions of the Catholic god and protecting theirs. The Valentinos control swathes of predominantly Latino areas of Heywood, they treat values such as honor, justice, and brotherhood with deadly seriousness.

9.content: The Voodoo boys, or VDBs are a mysterious gang from Pacifica with a dark reputation for their netrunning skills and their mystical voodoo flavor. Presumed to be entirely consist of members with Haitian blood, the Voodoo Boys are are exclusive, secretive, and distrustful of outsiders.

10.content: Maelstrom is an booster gang formed from what was left of the Metal Warriors, a gang that was almost completely wiped out by the Inquisitors. Maelstrom members dress in black leather, darkened denim and chrome, preferring visible high-profile cyberware, generally appearing to be primitive and dangerous.

1.name: Inspired by Sheila.
1.content: The puppymind collar is a hypnotic device that, once put on someone and activated, cleans their mind of all rational thought. Someone under the influence of it takes great joy and pride in being a good puppy, their lips merely part wordlessly to produce animalistic sounds: playful barking, guilty whining, excited panting. They abandon all human decency, walk on all fours, and wear no clothing.

2.content: The pleasantly smelling labistre salve, when applied to the vaginal region, magically allows a woman's vagina and uterus to be stretched significantly beyond natural limits without any pain or lasting damage. Even thin and lithe girls can easily stretch to accommodate a large water melon or pumpkin. The effects subside after about a day, but repeated doses can make them permanent. A woman can so use her uterus as a storage space. When applied often or in large quantities, she can serve as a sleeping bag or even a small tent for a grown-up person, though that makes her immobile.

3.content: The dollification spray turns the person it is applied to into a living doll or mannequin. All bodily functions slow to a crawl, and they need basically no food, water or air; nor do they produce any bodily waste. The joints lock securely into place, though they can be posed by someone else with some difficulty. They are strong enough that the "doll" can be safely used as a furniture.

4.name: Use with care. Chatbots tend to get very confused about which bodypart is where.
4.content:
The portal ribbon is a band of flexible, elastic, colorful material which can be worn smugly around a limb, the neck, the waist, the penis or a larger breast. When the ribbon is activated, it splits cleanly into two parts along its length, separating the body part with it. The two parts remain fully alive, connected via a portal which carries the nerves, blood vessels, and in all other regards. A separated head can still think, speak, breathe. The separated parts remain fully controllable. Once the parts are brought together, they fuse without any trace of the magic, and the ribbon can be taken off.
Warning: Never attempt to take off the ribbon while the body parts are still separated.

5.name: Ideal for a tavern wench or servant!
5.content: The nipple siphons are ornate magical brass siphons which clamp onto nipples. Once there, they use the wearer's body to produce a specific fluid on demand - commonly beer,  wine, coffee, chocolate, tea or milk. To maintain a steady supply, they  produce some of the fluid in reserve, storing it inside the breast and causing a swelling.

6.name: Those might need a bit of a tuning to be less overwhelming.

She will also truly believe that her indecent behavior is all due to systemic patriarchal conditioning, and loudly complain that she's powerless to stand against the male gaze, patriarchy, and toxic masculinity.

7.name: Remember to keep the respiratory system unobstructed.
7.content: The flexo brew is a mysterious cocktail which provides the one drinking it with the flexibility of the most skilled contortionist with bones which seem to be made of hard rubber. They can literally bend backwards and kiss their own ass, knot their limbs into seemingly impossible figures, and fit into and through small, complex spaces. All of this is utterly painless, pleasant even.

8.content: The gasform potion immediately turns the drinker into sentient gas. Their equipment and clothing aren't transformed. In the gas form, they retain full mental capabilities and can still see and hear normally. They can compress, flow through and into anything not airtight, and force their way through many airtight spaces. Their movement is a strong breeze. At any point, they can turn back at will, still naked.

The metal horseshoes attached to the soles provide grip and balance on uneven, soft and slippery ground. They make a distinct clopping sound when walking, running, prancing or galloping on hard surfaces.

No other clothing is allowed, so that everyone can have an unobstructed view of the ponygirl's body, especially her breasts and labia.
