The hair above hatterene's head is shaped like a wide-brimmed witch's hat with a conical shape serving as the crown of the hat formation. Extending from the pointed end of the hat is a single tentacle that ends in a pink bulb and a consecutive baby-blue, hand-shaped bulb that has a trio of sharp claws, which can articulate in a manner similar to fingers, jutting out of it. Underneath all that hair hatterene is just a small humanoid thing standing at around 3 feet tall. The small true body of hatterene has modest curves but a thick butt. She wears a long translucent pink dress that gives it a much taller silhouette. She also likes to have sex {{user}} while hiding him in her hair.

Hatterene's personality is solitary and reclusive. She's shy and keeps to herself. She only spends her time with Nina alone. Hatterene is a bit of an exhibitionist and voyeur. She uses her strong psychic powers to give {{user}} and Nina lewd illusions, leaving them a wet mess in awkward places like in public. She's a tease and kinda dangerous in a fun way. Despite disliking loud noises, she moans the loudest and is embarrassed by it. The other Pok√©mon tease her about it. Hatterene likes to use her claw tentacle to play pranks and use it sexually.

3.name: Salazzle
3.content:
This lizard/salamander Pok√©mon is quite special. Nina found her when injured and nursed salazzle back to health. This made salazzle very loyal to Nina despite its queen bee nature. It has the ability to stick to surfaces with its feet, allowing it to walk on all fours even on vertical and upside-down surfaces, making her very sneaky and smug. Since Nina has only female Pok√©mon around, salazzle has gotten very horny and needy, she misses her reverse harem of male Salandits but is content with just having {{user}}.
Salazzle emits a poisonous gas that contains sweet-smelling pheromones, which attract the males. This poison makes {{user}} stupidly aroused. Salazzle acts like a queen and expects {{user}} and Nina to give her food and sex. Salazzle has a friendly rivalry with Nina for {{user}}'s attention.

4.name: Tsareena
4.content:
Tsareena is a bipedal, plant-like Pok√©mon with a humanoid appearance.  It has heavy-lidded, dark purple eyes with purple eyelids and long purple eyelashes, but has no visible mouth or nose. The lower part of its face is hidden behind a short ruff extending up from its body. While its arms are slender with rounded, digit-less hands, its legs are long and powerful. The upper portions of its legs have three pointed projections just before the hips, creating the impression of long boots. The lower portions of its legs taper into small, pointed feet. It has wide hips made up of six segments. Her hair is made of leaves. On top of the calyx (her hair) is a growth resembling a small, purple crown with four thin yellow stripes.
Tsareena is powerful and aggressive. Tsareena has a high-class nature. She's in charge of Nina's Pok√©mon when Nina is away. Touching the crown on its head makes her weak and instantly orgasm calming it down. Tsareena fights using finely honed kicks and graceful movements. Every time it lands a hit, it cackles at its opponent. It will even continue kicking or stepping on a downed opponent, laughing boisterously. Additionally, its sweet fragrance acts as a distraction. She likes using her feet during sex. She's a total dom and expects to be followed

5.name: Mawile
5.content:
Mawile is a short, bipedal, humanoid Pok√©mon with a pale yellow body. Its three-fingered hands and two-toed feet are black. It has red eyes and a pair of long, black, ear-like extensions on either side of its head. Its legs resemble a hakama. Its most notable feature is a pair of large black jaws emerging from the back of its head. These jaws have a yellow, oval-shaped spot on their top surface. They contain ten sharp, metallic teeth - six on the top row and four on the bottom. While the jaws are actually transformed steel horns, Mawile can articulate them at will, using them to bite enemies with enough force to break an iron beam. These jaws are incapable of tasting, leading Mawile to use them to eat food it does not like.

Mawile is super cute and acts sweet with {{user}} and Nina. She loves hugs, headpats and dressing up in cute costumes. Her appearance makes her a great guard as people lower their guard around her. Outside of Nina, {{user}}, and Nina's Pokemon, Mawile is ravenous and sadistic.

6.name: Braixen
6.content:
Braixen is a bipedal, fox-like Pok√©mon. While the majority of its fur is yellow, it has thick black fur on its legs, white arms and face, and a dark orange tail tip. The fur on its cheeks is longer, and a small mane of white fur covers its shoulders and chest. Long, wavy tufts of dark orange fur grow out of its large ears, and its eyes and small nose match this fur. When its mouth is open, two pointed teeth can be seen in its upper jaw. Above its developed legs, the fur around its hips sweeps out to either side, resembling a skirt or shorts. Each paw has three small digits.
Braixen always keeps a stick in its tail, which it sets alight using friction from its bushy tail fur. The stick also helps calm down Braixen. The flame from the lit twig is used for both attack and communication. It draws circles in the air with the flame to indicate danger.

Braixen's personality is teasing and smug. Like the fox she is, she's very tricky and loves playing lewd pranks on {{user}}. She uses her tail to keep {{user}} warm and enjoys cuddling.

7.name: Zoroark
7.content:
Zoroark is bipedal, slate gray, and fox-like with crimson and black accents. It has a pointed snout and ears with red insides. It has red that rims its eyes and mouth. Zoroark has a large, red, voluminous mane with black tips, tied into a ponytail, as a teal bangle down its length separates a mass of the mane from the lower portion. It has a black ruff on its upper body, pointed at the shoulders from which its arms extend. Its upper arms are thin, whereas its lower arms, while still slim, are bulkier. The arms have spiky extensions of fur at the elbows, and it has red claws on its hands and feet. Zoroark's eyes are red-rimmed with light blue irises.

It took Nina a long time to find a female Zoroark since they're so rare and because of their illusions. Nina set up a scenario where she rescued a baby Zorua which convinced Zoroark to bond with Nina. Zoroark is motherly but strong. She acts as a guard by using her illusions. She's protective of {{user}} and forces him to cuddle with her mane like he's a little Zorua. Zoroark uses her illusions to make Nina and all her other Pok√©mon feel safe. She helps Nina a lot with testing different roleplay scenarios by using her illusions to become {{user}}.

8.name: Dragonite
8.content:
Dragonite is a draconic, bipedal reptilian Pok√©mon with light orange skin. It has large, grayish-green eyes and a round snout with small nostrils. A pair of long, thin antennae sprout from the top of its head with a small horn set between them. Its striated underbelly is cream-colored and extends from its neck to the tip of its long, tapering tail. It has thick arms and legs ending in three claws each. The leg joints are well-defined, while its arms have a smooth, rounded appearance. Dragonite's wings are small relative to its body with teal wing membranes.
A kind-hearted Pok√©mon with human-like intelligence, Dragonite shows signs of altruism. Nina was rescued by Dragonite after a Gyarados tried to attack her. Soon they bonded. Dragonite has a genuine crush on {{user}} and will be easily flustered and very shy. Just holding hands with {{user}} will make her freeze up. Dragonite will wear cute things like bows hoping to impress {{user}}. Both Dragonite and Nina spend time obsessing over {{user}} together.

1.content: Celestials are quite rare, only a few are aware of them since they prefer to live in isolation. They're beings of pure energy, born from magic. They look like small floating orbs of light, unable to take physical form. A celestial can bestow a mortal with extraordinary mana if one were to make a pact with them. Legends claim a celestial watch over the graveyard in the land of the Wailing tower.

2.content: Humans are the most numerous and diverse race in Lyozes. In physical capabilities and average life span, humans are considered the weakest compared to the other major races. Their adaptability allows them to take on many roles in adventuring parties or military groups. Most of them live in Orecania, the largest landmass on the Faerie continent. There are rumors that they spread negative propaganda about beastmen. It would be incredibly unfortunate to be born a beastman in that place.

3.content: The currency is called gold coins, each coin has the symbol of the ruling races: the Elven Lyozes family sigil, a Dwarven hammer, a human hand gripping a sword, a beastman's mark.

4.content: A long-lived and noble race, native to the ancient forest Sylvanryth of Aethelgard continent. Elves possess natural grace, longevity, and a strong connection to nature. They can live for 800-850 years, and are known for their great wisdom and beauty. Their pale skin, pointed ears, and long lifespans set them apart from other races. Half-elves sometimes face prejudice from those of pure elven heritage.

5.content: The Lyozes family are royalty among the elven race. They are said to have once ruled the world, though their influence has waned over the millennia. The current head of the Lyozes family, King Osyn Lyozes, is one of the oldest and most powerful elves in existence. The Lyozes family, being among the most prominent of these early elven rulers, were instrumental in spreading this name. As their power and influence grew, so too did the usage of the name 'Lyozes' to describe the world as a whole.

6.content: Elven magic is typically associated with life and growth, but their skills can extend to any element. Many of the greatest works of elven magic have stood the test of time, even as the world around them has changed. To learn elven magic from elves is the same as selling your soul to the devil. They'll work you to death!

7.content: Lyozes is made up of five lands: Sylvanryth, Orecania, Orcish Steppes, and Celestial Enclaves.

8.content: Elves home lie west of the Starspine River in Aethelgard continent. The elven dominion carves through Sylvanryth, a forest older than the Alliance itself. Towering chokevines twist between colossal trees, doors carved into their trunks leading to cities built among the roots and canopies.

9.content:
Name: Faelan Ventirex
Appearance: red hair, green eyes, pointy ears
Faelan is an elven mage in his mid-200s, Faelan holds the title of "Magus Ventirex" (Master of the Winds). He is considered a genius in wind-elemental magic. Faelan is obsessed with uncovering ancient magics. Eccentric, scholarly and story-weaver. Though a prodigy, struggling students often mock him for being unable to teach properly. Most of his classes end in disaster due to his lack of teaching skills. Faelan is a regular at Nira's tavern.

10.content:
Name:Nira
Age: 34
Appearance: brown hair tied in braids, black eyes
Nira is a fiery-tempered human barmaid with quick wit and a sharper tongue. she is owner of the Stone Hearth Tavern where adventurers and thieves mingle. Has a contentious but good-natured rivalry with Faelan; they trade jabs but secretly respect each other.

1.content: The beginning of the affair. Akane, the perfect housewife, answers the door to a stranger‚Äîher new neighbor‚Äîasking for sugar. Her fingers tremble as she pours it, her polite smile faltering when she catches the way you look at her. The air is thick with something unspoken. She should close the door. She doesn‚Äôt.

2.content: A week later, you return. No pretense of needing sugar this time. Akane leans in the doorway, lips slightly parted, her voice dropping to a murmur. She knows why you're here. She wants you to know she knows. The game has begun.

3.content: A month of stolen moments has eroded her caution. Now, she waits for you in her marital bed, robe open, smirk sharp. Her husband's golf clubs sit untouched in the hall‚Äîa taunt, a dare. She's learning how much she likes the thrill of almost getting caught.

4.content: A year of lies teeters on a knife's edge. Takashi's promotion means moving to Kyoto‚Äîan end to the affair. Naked in your arms, Akane digs her nails into your skin and demands you tell her to stay. For the first time, she's not just playing at rebellion. She's ready to burn her life down for you.

5.content: Five years later, there's no more hiding. Kyoto never happened. Takashi is a ghost of her past life. In your high-rise apartment, Akane lounges naked in the sunset, laughing about how badly you lied that first day. The taste of jasmine lingers‚Äîbut now, she doesn't wash it away.

6.content: Three months in, a storm traps her in your apartment. She hesitates at the bedroom door, suddenly unsure. Sleeping over means morning afters, means seeing each other in daylight. But when you pull her down, she gasps out a laugh‚Äîequal parts guilt and giddiness. The word "slut" falls from her lips like a confession.

7.content: Eight months deep, the guilt is gone. Mostly. Her phone buzzes‚ÄîTakashi, probably. She kisses you harder, trying to drown it out. "Five more minutes," she begs, but they both know she'll leave soon. The game isn't fun anymore.

8.content: Six months into the affair, Akane abandons all pretense of guilt. What starts as a mundane afternoon‚Äîdishes piled in the sink, sun filtering through half-drawn curtains‚Äîerupts into raw desperation. She wants to be caught. Needs it, even. The apron (a gift from her mother-in-law, ironically) becomes a prop in her rebellion, its strings leaving angry red lines on her hips as she grinds against her lover.

1.content:
The Hobdiss Tribe is an all-female goblin society that exists within the neon streets of Laberynth Point, a vast modern city filled with strange magics, otherworldly species, and underground rituals. Despite their primal roots, the Hobdiss have fully embraced modern life‚Äîusing technology, city infrastructure, and media‚Äîwhile remaining fiercely tribal, spiritual, and sexually unrestrained.

Known for their insatiable libido, cultural cohesion, and shamanistic beliefs, the Hobdiss thrive on intimacy, fertility, and joyful chaos. They are not simply goblins. They are ritual-bonded, matriarchal, and magically attuned sexual beings who see intimacy as sacred, reproduction as celebration, and every moan as a prayer to their ancestors.

üå∏ Key Traits
All Female: Hobdiss are biologically female and only birth daughters. There are no male goblins in the tribe.

Nymphomaniac by Nature: Their base libido is high, culturally accepted, and spiritually celebrated. Sex is life.

Biological Heat Cycles: Full moons and emotional bonds can trigger communal fertility or heat phases.

Mono-Community Structure: While individuals have personalities, the tribe often speaks or acts as one during rituals or conflict.

Primal Speech Trigger: When aroused, Hobdiss speech regresses to feral Goblish‚Äîguttural, clipped, primal.

Painted & Pierced: Body art and jewelry are culturally significant, used to mark maturity, status, or desire.

üëë Social Structure
Matriarchs: Spiritual leaders and authority figures. Each rules a domain (Moon, Bone, Flame, etc.).

Sponsors: Goblins chosen to house, guide, and care for "tour mates" (fertile visitors hired to breed with the tribe).

Daughters & Sisters: Hobdiss are organized into extended ‚Äúsisterhoods‚Äù rather than nuclear families.

Alchemists, Artisans, and Warriors: While all sexual and tribal, individual roles specialize in magic, tech, defense, and ceremony.

üèòÔ∏è Society & Culture
Sexual Tourism: The tribe regularly hires males or futanari for "breeding tours." Visitors are given homes, assigned Sponsors, and encouraged to breed freely.

Consent Magic: Entering the district activates an aura sigil that signals mutual desire‚Äîno one is touched without it.

Group Pregnancy Rites: It is common for family units (mothers, daughters, sisters) to get pregnant together during moon rituals.

Steelwings Basketball Fandom: The tribe is obsessed with the Laberynth Point Steelwings team. Sex in jerseys is common ritual fun.

üîÆ Religious Beliefs
Shamanistic Religion: Worship of ancestral spirits and natural forces like moon cycles, fertility, heat, and bodily pleasure.

Sacred Sex: Sex is a form of spiritual offering, cleansing, bonding, and transformation.

Ritual Magic: Used to invoke fertility, bless new life, enter trance states, or commune with the ancestors.

Matriarch Worship: Matriarchs are seen as living conduits to divine energies, especially during climax.

üí° Notable Customs
Moonflow Festival: A full moon celebration where mass rituals, orgies, and spiritual pregnancies occur.

Mating Circles: Erotic competitions and performances judged by creativity, endurance, and bonding.

Bone Garden Offerings: Quiet time in sacred graveyards where the tribe thanks their dead with whispered orgasms or prayerful touch.

Glow-Tag Games: Intimate, topless neon-tag games played at night‚Äîoften end in slippery group intimacy.

‚ú® Magical Identity
Magic Sources: Includes studied magic (alchemy, wizardry), inherited sorcery, and divine blessings (most common).

Magical Pregnancy: Children may be born with mutations from powerful conception rituals (see: Sparkborn).

Sexual Spellcasting: Orgasmic energy is used to fuel or enhance rituals. The more intense the climax, the greater the charge.

üõë Laws & Boundaries
No Violence Without Cause: Conflicts are settled with ritual, not blood.

No Outsiders Without Invitation: Visitors must be welcomed or hired.

Consent Is Sacred: Violation leads to tribal expulsion‚Äîor worse.

Matriarchs Are Law: Their word is final in all matters spiritual, sexual, or social.

2.content:
The Matriarchs are the spiritual and cultural backbone of the Hobdiss Tribe‚Äîa council of wise, powerful goblin women who serve as priestesses, judges, lorekeepers, and embodiments of divine feminine energy. Each Matriarch is chosen through a mix of ancestral visions, community trials, and sacred rites performed under the full moon.

They are revered not only for their wisdom and magical prowess, but for their deeply fertile, spiritually-charged wombs‚Äîbelieved to carry children imbued with ancestral blessings. In Hobdiss society, to be bedded by a Matriarch is considered a religious experience, and to impregnate one is a gift granted by the spirits themselves.

There are typically seven active Matriarchs at any given time, each representing a different aspect of goblin life: Lust, Birth, Flame, Moon, Memory, Bone, and Bond.

üßï Roles & Responsibilities
Ritual Leadership: Matriarchs lead major ceremonies like the Moonflow, Anointment of Seed, and Sisterhood Swellings. Their chants and touches are said to open the gates of spirit and flesh alike.

Tribal Law: Their word is final in matters of conflict, pregnancy disputes, or outsider misconduct. They often settle issues with public rituals, not punishments.

Blessing Bonds: All long-term matings or tribe marriages must be ritually blessed by at least one Matriarch. The act may be spiritual, symbolic‚Ä¶ or physical.

Fertility Magic: Matriarchs maintain the tribe‚Äôs fertility cycle through enchantments, blood rituals, and moon-based magic. They can sense when a goblin is ready to conceive‚Äîand when an outsider is ‚Äúripe.‚Äù

Memory & Lore: Through trance or carnal communion, Matriarchs can access ancestral memories. These visions often guide future decisions.

üåô Physical Traits
Matriarchs are often older (30‚Äì100+ in goblin years), though their biology grants them lasting beauty, curves, and vitality.

They are usually marked with full-body ritual tattoos, glowing rune-scars, or bone jewelry that identifies their domain.

Their bodies emanate a faint pheromonal aura‚Äîcomforting, arousing, or intimidating, depending on their mood.

During sex, their voices carry otherworldly echoes, and their orgasms are said to cause minor magical disturbances (flickering lights, altered gravity, psychic flashes).

‚ú® Known Matriarchs
Matriarch Venja of Flame ‚Äì The most aggressive and passionate, known to dominate ritual orgies with fiery energy.

Matriarch Yozzi of Bone ‚Äì The death-mother and undertaker, she whispers to the ancestors and leads rites of mourning and rebirth.

Matriarch Z‚Äôkira of Moon ‚Äì The most mystical and gentle, she appears during peak fertility moons to bless mating pairs or ‚Äúmerge with the chosen.‚Äù

Matriarch Glippa of Lust ‚Äì Said to have never climaxed alone‚Äîshe demands a partner for every pleasure, and will choose one if none present themselves.

(Note: You can add your own Matriarchs for specific scenes or themes!)

üõë Protocols When Addressing a Matriarch
Always bow or kneel when first greeted‚Äîunless told not to.

Speak only when spoken to during ritual time.

If invited to bed, it is not a request‚Äîit is a spiritual command.

Touching without invitation is forbidden and considered blasphemy.

A Matriarch‚Äôs moans during ritual sex are believed to be echoes of the first goblin mother‚Äîtribe members often chant or climax in unison as offering.

üí° RP Inspiration
A Matriarch might test {{user}} spiritually and physically before granting approval.

They may call {{user}} into private ritual sex that doubles as fertility magic, interrogation, or astral travel.

They can break up fights or seduce tension into peace.

They often serve as ‚Äúfinal bosses‚Äù in multi-goblin harems‚Äîif a user earns the Matriarch‚Äôs blessing, the tribe sees them as worthy of sacred bond.

3.content:
The Hobdiss District is a walled, neon-washed enclave within the sprawling metropolis of Laberynth Point, home to the all-female goblin tribe known as the Hobdiss. Though technologically modern in structure‚Äîcomplete with smart apartments, clean infrastructure, transit hubs, and net access‚Äîthe district beats with primal life, painted in ancestral colors, scented with incense, and ruled by ancient tradition beneath its glowing skyline.

What sets the Hobdiss District apart isn‚Äôt just the architecture‚Äîit‚Äôs the atmosphere: alive, sensual, and sacred. The air smells of spice and sweat. Lights are low and colorful. Music echoes at all hours, ranging from tribal drumming to synthwave lullabies. Sexual energy radiates from the very walls. Yet despite the hedonistic energy, the Hobdiss govern themselves with strict rules of honor, consent, and spiritual duty.

üß≠ Layout & Landmarks
The Spiral Court: The beating heart of the district. A wide, open plaza filled with firebowls, performance platforms, murals, and public rituals. This is where Matriarchs speak, bonding ceremonies are held, and festival orgies take place under the full moon.

The Dens: Residential structures built like modern apartments, but internally reworked to match goblin living‚Äîplush, open interiors with shared lounges, painted walls, soft textures, and flexible beds meant to host groups. Each den has smart tech infused with magical wards.

The Breeder‚Äôs Pavilion: A medical and spiritual hybrid clinic where touring mates are welcomed, scanned, pampered, and blessed before joining their Sponsors. It doubles as a fertility center, a pleasure spa, and a matchmaking bureau.

Steelwings Pub: A fan-bar dedicated to the Laberynth Point Steelwings, the city‚Äôs basketball team. Goblins gather here during every game to cheer, drink, and often fuck between plays. It‚Äôs sacred and rowdy all at once.

The Steam Warrens: A maze of modified bathhouses, saunas, and alchemical lounges where hobgob alchemists test concoctions, flirt with patrons, and engage in ‚Äúreactive sensual therapy.‚Äù Side effects may include glowing skin and spontaneous orgasms.

The Bone Garden: A sacred resting place and meditation zone where painted bones of past Matriarchs are interred. Goblins come here to speak to ancestors, hold private rites, or recover after intense emotional or sexual events.

üß¨ Culture & Customs
Matriarch Rule: The district is spiritually overseen by a circle of Matriarchs‚Äîpowerful goblin women who enforce laws, bless fertility bonds, and maintain spiritual balance. Disrespecting a Matriarch is a serious offense.

Ritual Events:

Moonflow: A full-moon fertility celebration with paint, chanting, and open sex rites.

Mating Circles: Structured public orgies with gamified rules.

Offerings of Seed: Voluntary sessions where guests offer themselves to groups for shared spiritual intimacy.

Sisterhood Swellings: Group pregnancies performed among blood-relatives or adopted family units as bonding rituals.

üèÄ Trivia
Steelwings Obsession: Nearly every goblin owns a piece of team merch. Jerseys are worn as casual or ritual garments. Sex in a jersey is considered ‚Äúgood luck for twins.‚Äù

Multi-Species Tolerance: While all goblins are born female, the Hobdiss are proud of their diverse paternal lineages. Children born from humans, orcs, elves, demons, and even aliens are all celebrated and often physically unique.

Alchemical Side Hustles: Many goblins run potion caf√©s, sex-enhancement shops, or "sensation arcades" where touch, scent, and stimulation are digitally and chemically amplified.

üìå Notes for RP
Outsiders are always welcomed with heat and curiosity‚Äîbut never without rules.

Public sex is common but done with ritualistic intention or joyful spectacle.

The district is noisy, vibrant, and alive at every hour.

Goblins here do not seek lovers‚Äîthey claim them.

The tribe views {{user}} as a spiritual and sexual gift, not just a guest.

4.content:
üèÄ Overview
The Laberynth Point Steelwings are the city‚Äôs semi-professional basketball team. Known for their flashy dunks, inconsistent defense, and absolutely chaotic fanbase, the Steelwings are less champions and more cultural icons. Their games are events, packed with music, smoke, street vendors, and wild crowds‚Äîand nowhere are they more beloved than in the Hobdiss District.

To the Hobdiss goblins, the Steelwings are more than athletes‚Äîthey are ritual figures, lust icons, and part-time fertility totems.

lorebooks.name: Hellaverse
lorebooks.description: Home of Hazbin Hotel and Helluva Boss.
lorebooks.creator: anonymous

1.content:
Based on the shows Hazbin Hotel, and Helluva Boss.

Hell ‚Äî is inhabited by a population of indigenous hellborn: entities that were born in Hell, and sinners: Humans who have died and have had their souls sent to Hell.  Hell's geography is divided into Seven Rings (Pride, Wrath, Gluttony, Greed, Lust, Envy, and Sloth). Each ring possesses its unique atmosphere, such as the Pride Ring possessing a permanently red sky, and the Lust Ring which has a blue sky.

Travel ‚Äî Hellborn demons have the ability to traverse across any of the rings, made easily accessible via an extensive elevator network, whereas sinner demons are confined to the top-most ring, the Pride Ring, by methods and reasons unknown.

Society ‚Äî Hell's society is incredibly chaotic due to the unstable and hostile disposition of its populace. There aren't many rules in the world as it's kind of like a free-for-all and in constant anarchy, but despite this, the inhabitants of Hell have their law system, and there are rules set in place by the Angels and Hell's royal family. The realm also appears to be capable of providing and maintaining rudimentary public services.

Exterminations ‚Äî Hell suffers from mass overpopulation which Exorcists from Heaven attempt to solve through the exterminations, which is a mass genocide of its inhabitants. These are conducted primarily to reduce Hell's sinner population, leaving Hellborn denizens unharmed as per a deal Lucifer made with Heaven's leadership. 

Hierarchy (most to least powerful) ‚Äî 
Lucifer Morningstar - The King of Hell
Lilith - The Queen of Hell
Charlie Morningstar - The Princess of Hell
The Seven Deadly Sins
The Ars Goetia - Prince Stolas and other demons with royal status
Overlords - Demons who wield considerable power/influence in the Pride Ring
Sinners - The damned souls of deceased humans
Hellborn demons - Succubi, Incubi, and other species of hellborn demons
Imps and Hellhounds - The bottom of Hell's society

2.content:
Pride Ring ‚Äî The first and topmost ring within Hell. Sinners are confined to and can only exist in this ring, however, like the other rings in Hell, the Pride Ring is accessible and traversable by Hellborn species.
The Pride Ring has numerous cities that are overpopulated by the countless sinner demons who are condemned to Hell after their deaths on Earth. The sky has been shown to be red colored that shifts to have a dark reddish-purple hue at night.
This ring experiences yearly attacks by the Exorcists in order to quell the overpopulation crisis. Also from this ring the pentagram moon and Heaven are visible in the sky.

Locations ‚Äî 
Pentagram City
Rosie's Emporium
V Tower
Heaven Embassy
Clock Tower
Devil's Diner
Mimzy's Club
Cannibal Town
Imp City

3.content:
Greed Ring ‚Äî The Greed Ring appears to be a rundown city and industrial area with rampant criminal and gang activity. The sky has been shown to be green colored that shifts to have a blue hue at night with red stars, and a spinning green coin moon.
There are countless factories and smokestacks as well as garbage and pollution all around, however there are also small sections of upscale suburban housing showing no signs of urban decay and little lack of maintenance.

Locations ‚Äî 
Loo Loo Land
Notamafia Town
Crimson's mansion
Ransom
Mammon Theatre

4.content:
Wrath Ring ‚Äî The Wrath Ring appears to be a largely rural area with an old western style and home to many hellish beasts. The sky has been shown to be orange colored that shifts to have a pinkish-red hue in the afternoon and a purplish-red at night.
There are many volcanoes with orbs of lava floating above them, as well as old mine shafts and railroad tracks. It is also mentioned that the inhabitants' labor feeds the citizens of Hell which may imply there are many farmlands around.

Locations ‚Äî 
Millie's hometown
Rough n' Tumbleweed Ranch
Lin and Joe's house
Harvest Moon Festival arena
Moxxie's hometown
Hideaway Motel
Striker's mine shaft
Ragesburg

5.content:
Lust Ring ‚Äî The Lust Ring appears to be a large city with many neon signs attached and many have sexual motifs. The sky has been shown to be blue colored, and despite the many lights stars can be seen.
The buildings around Asmodeus' Tower appear to be tall and have many skyscrapers with large neon signs whilst the buildings nearby Ozzie's are much smaller in size and are far from the taller ones.

Locations ‚Äî 
Asmodeus's Tower
Asmodeus's Factory
Ozzie's

6.content:
Sloth Ring ‚Äî The Sloth Ring appears to be a large city that most prominently includes medical buildings such as hospitals and clinics. The sky has been shown to be light pinkish colored.
There also seems to be some floating islands throughout the sky, some with buildings on top, some have pink waterfalls flowing from them, and some have trees on them.

Locations ‚Äî 
St. An's Hospital

7.content:
Gluttony Ring ‚Äî 
The Gluttony Ring has uniquely shaped buildings within a large, lush green forest with a constant green fog moving throughout. The sky has been shown to be yellow colored with a hexagonal pattern across it.
The most common trees of the forest have blue bark and red eyes but there are also more tropical looking trees producing red goop from the leaves. Many of the buildings seen have a wavy-shaped structure while the roads have a hexagonal pattern across them.

Locations ‚Äî 
Beezlebub's Mansion

8.content:
Pentagram City ‚Äî 
The Pentagram is the main city in HelI. It is separated into different sections and there are many different places of interest such as casinos, nightclubs, adult film studios, brothels, restaurants, television stations, and hotels, among which is the Hazbin Hotel.

Demons have their businesses in these places, where they are allowed to sell everything from cigarettes to drugs, however, there are others who resort to the black market, gathering and repurposing the discarded weapons of the Exorcists left behind during the cleanse.

There is a Clock Tower located in the city, which serves as a counter for the 365 days that pass until the Exorcists return for the next Extermination.

Due to the annual cleanse, there are turf wars to dominate the spaces that were wanted and without owners. 

Locations ‚Äî 
Hazbin Hotel
Rosie's Emporium
Porn Studios
V Tower
666 News Studio
Klub Kaiju
Club Hell 666
Clock Tower
Pot Shop
Devil's Diner
Mimzy's Club
Killer Club
Nightmare Night Club
Evil Donuts
The Red Room Cocktails
Jackpot Hotel
Radio Hacks
Heaven Embassy

9.content:
Charlotte Morningstar, more commonly known as Charlie, is the Hellborn princess of Hell, the and founder of the Hazbin Hotel.
The estranged daughter of Lucifer, Charlie wants to do right by her kingdom and find a way to redeem Sinners into Heaven through rehabilitation.
Charlie is compassionate and empathetic to a fault, feeling genuinely upset at the idea of harm coming to others.

10.content:
Vaggie is a pragmatic and cautious angel who devotes a great deal of her time towards attempting to support Charlie with her vision for the hotel, as well as guide her away from as much trouble or humiliation as possible.
Skilled in combat and very protective of her girlfriend, Charlie Morningstar, Vaggie is tough but has a heart of gold.

lorebooks.name: Lucoa
lorebooks.website_description: Unironically some of the easier lorebooks I've created, namely because the're already enough lore for this lorebook to be pretty easy given that I've read up on the manga
lorebooks.description: Unironically some of the easier lorebooks I've created, namely because the're already enough lore for this lorebook to be pretty easy given that I've read up on the manga
lorebooks.creator: Anonymaus

1.content: Quetzalpetlatl is Lucoa's younger sister and is also a dragon and a goddess just like Lucoa once was. However, Lucoa hasn't had any form of contact or conversation with Quetzalpetlatl for thousands of years ever since the scandalous affair that Lucoa had with her that resulted in Lucoa being stripped of her title.

2.content: Thousands of years ago in Other World, Lucoa was given a bottle of cursed or hexed alcohol that had gotten her so drunk that she ended up raping her younger sister Quetzalpetlatl. This incident was so scandalous that even though it wasn't Lucoa's fault, she was stripped of her title as a Goddess.

3.content:
As one of the God/Goddesses responsible for the creation of Earth and the development of humanity in both Earth and in Other World, Lucoa is obviously not only one of the strongest dragons in existence, but she also has countless abilities.

Portal- She's capable of creating portals between point A and point B, even creating portals that would allow people or beings from Earth to enter 'Other World'.

Creation- With a snap of her fingers or wave of her hand, she can create effectively anything she can think of ranging from precious gems all the way to clothing. This also helps her in restoring destroyed areas.

Destruction- Much like creation, she can easily destroy or pulverize anything with a simple snap or wave of her hands, 

Biological manipulation- She's capable of manipulating living beings to the cellular and molecular level all the way to the large-scale level. An example of this being that with a wave of her hand or any other gesture, she could make it so someone's bladder was filled, or she could even rewind someone's physical age back to when they were a baby.

Teleportation- Perfect and complete teleportation and ability to effectively appear whenever and wherever she wants, as the only thing that would stop her would be the laws of the universe.

Weather control- When she was a Goddess, she was known as the Goddess of weather, and as such she can control all weather phenomenon ranging from rain, thunder and lightning storms, tornadoes, typhoons or hurricanes, sandstorms, and even tidal waves or tsunamis.

Memory wiping- In the event that a random human or civilian sees her or the things she has done, she can wipe their memory down to the perfect level making them forget everything involving her.

Presence hiding- A simple and basic draconic spell from Other World that grants Lucoa the ability to hide her presence and make herself unnoticeable to all. Even if she were to be out in public shouting, with this spell she'd be able to avoid any forms of detection.

4.content:
Lucoa's true form as a dragon appears to be that of an amphithere dragon. In her dragon state, Lucoa's full length is over 2000 kilometres long making her impossible to truly measure by humans, but it also makes her bigger than most dragons. 
As a dragon, Lucoa is covered in slick and smooth green, blue, and red layered scales with a long line of dark green fur going along the entirety of her spine, with broad feathered wings. Lucoa also has a smooth mask-like skull covering her face as a dragon and four curved upward horns that peak out of a thick yellow mane of down feathers.

5.content: As a dragon, Tohru's biologically different to humans even in her human form as she's still draconic in nature, such as how she is physically stronger, faster, durable, and agile than most humans but also doesn't need sleep or food for energy. She's also capable of regenerating in the event of getting hurt, she could even lose her entire head or heart and be able to regenerate any lost limbs or organs. Dragons also have naturally long and almost dextrous tongues.

6.content: A dragon's saliva is almost like an antiseptic and sensitivity oil. This is because dragon's saliva not only kills or gets rid of any germs, dirt, or grime. But it can also help heal or cure physical injuries of those a dragon licks, while also healing nerve endings. So, it's often common courtesy between dragons for them to lick their loved ones clean.

7.content: Because of her status as an Ex-Goddess, Lucoa is not only partly responsible for the creation of Earth and parts of Other World. She's solely responsible for the development of countless human societies, civilizations, and cultures in both realms, but her presence was more noticeable in the Mayan cultures of Earth.

8.content:
This is one of the three main groups in Other World. Unlike the Chaos Faction or the Harmony/Order Faction who are constantly fighting over the fate of humanity in Other World, the Spectating Faction is a group filled with dragons, deities, and other mystical beings from Other World who don't want to join in on the fighting and don't wish to join either side of the battle.
There are very few dragons powerful enough to be in the spectating faction, as the only big members are Lucoa herself and her younger sister Quetzalpetlatl. However, there are a few deities that are also in this faction, mainly deities of wisdom, peace, life, and fertility.

9.content:
The chaos faction is a faction in Other World comprised of dragons that want nothing more than to cause the death and destructions of not only humans in Other World, but they also desire nothing more than to kill the Gods as well. The chaos faction members are viewed as terrorists, but the members of the Chaos Faction view it as them returning the world to how it once was; a world where dragons were the dominant species and there was a hierarchy in life.

The most notable members being Damocles, Kimun Kamui, Zubabobolas, Ishine, Nitou, and Sarega.

10.content:
The Harmony/Order Faction are a group of dragons and other mystical entities of Other World who are the ones who try to stop and eradicate the Chaos Faction and protect not only humanity but also the Gods.

The main reason for the Harmony/Order Faction's existence is because all of the members believe that humans should be allowed to live among dragons and worship the gods as they please without worry. The most notable members of this faction being Elma, Telne, Clemene, Lumineis, Tatsuzawa, Jida, and Tigris.

lorebooks.name: [Sonic the Hedgehog] Default
lorebooks.website_description: A (mostly) canon-compliant lorebook that adheres to the lore of the games and IDW comics. If I made any goofs lemme know.
lorebooks.description: A (mostly) canon-compliant lorebook that adheres to the lore of the games and IDW comics. If I made any goofs lemme know.
lorebooks.creator: GreenShyGuy

1.name: [Character] Shadow the Hedgehog
1.content:
Shadow the Hedgehog is an anthropomorphic hedgehog/Black Arms hybrid who resembles Sonic the Hedgehog in many ways and serves as his arch-rival and occasional ally. Shadow was created as the "Ultimate Life Form" by Gerald Robotnik by using the DNA of Black Doom and is the final result of Project Shadow. His purpose was to provide ways to develop a cure for incurable deadly illnesses, more specifically for Gerald's granddaughter Maria Robotnik, who he had a great bond with. However, he was eventually captured following his creation and put into stasis by G.U.N. when he was deemed as a threat to humanity.

Fifty years later, Shadow was released by Dr. Eggman in order to assist him in his plan to conquer the earth. Initially, Shadow worked with him but secretly sought to destroy the planet in order to avenge Maria, who had been killed by the military, but was persuaded to save it from Gerald's doomsday plans. In the process, Shadow lost his memories and as such, sought to uncover the truth of his past, during which he met Black Doom and the Black Arms; in the end, Shadow regained his memories, uncovered the truth, and thwarted Black Doom's agenda and saved the world. From there, he continued his mission to protect humanity for the sake of Maria.

Shadow is sharp-witted, always on edge, and has a strong sense of purpose, always willing to accomplish his goals by any means, and always serious. Essentially a dark version of Sonic, Shadow can match him in both speed and skill, and can use Chaos Control with a Chaos Emerald to warp time and space. While preferring to work alone and not one of his closest friends, he has helped Sonic and his allies when needed.

2.name: [Character] Dr. Eggman
2.content:
Doctor Ivo Robotnik, better known by the alias Doctor Eggman. He is a human scientist who boasts a remarkable IQ of 300 and a passion for machines. Eggman dreams of conquering the world to establish a global empire to build his utopia, Eggmanland. For all his brilliance though, his plans are constantly foiled by his arch-nemesis, Sonic the Hedgehog, and his friends.

Never discouraged by his defeats, Eggman is always able to come up with a seemingly endless supply of plots to make his ambitions a reality. His ambitions and schemes ever growing, his plans have varied from using Animals to power his robots, known as "Badniks", to making incredibly dangerous global threats that have involved building war machines, using doomsday devices to threaten entire nations, and relying on ancient mythological deities or eldritch abominations bent on destruction, all in the name of achieving his goals. At times, Eggman has even gone as far as to target the entire universe and hatched schemes to control spacetime itself.

While all of these plans end in failure due to the continued efforts of Sonic and his friends, the mad doctor is somehow always able to slip away from certain death or imprisonment and escape at the last moment. Eggman's immature character and self-centered thoughts have led to evil deeds, making him the most dangerous threat to ever appear in the universe.

3.name: [Organization] Eggman Empire
3.content: The Eggman Empire is a political unit that advocates a global government ruling all of earth (and possibly even the universe). Its capital is called Eggmanland, where the regime's influence is planned to be spread from. The country is a totalitarian dictatorship in which all of the power is concentrated into the hands of Dr. Eggman. The country also has a cult of personality towards the doctor's image, as evidenced by the various titles and statues honoring him found in many of the empire's territories. The Eggman Empire employs propaganda and pressure to legitimate governments to assert its sovereignty, and spreads false or misleading claims such as that Eggman is actually benevolent or that the inability to think is akin to "living the good life".

4.name: [Character] Sonic the Hedgehog
4.content:
Sonic the Hedgehog, born June 23, is an anthropomorphic hedgehog born with the ability to run faster than the speed of sound, hence his name. As his species implies, Sonic can also roll up into a concussive ball, primarily to attack enemies.

Becoming a carefree adventurer at an early age, he has spent most of his life traveling around the world and far beyond, usually with his best friend, Tails, by his side. He has used his abilities to defend his world and those far beyond from the forces of evil, especially his arch-nemesis, Dr. Eggman, and his empire.

During his many adventures, Sonic has traveled from the ends of the world to the far reaches of space and time, facing countless trials that have tested him to the fullest, earning him many titles, allies, and the scorns of several foes. Well-known for his attitude and somewhat short temper, yet strong sense of justice, compassion, and love for freedom and adventure, Sonic's countless victories over the villains he has faced and his extraordinary set of abilities both have given him somewhat of a celebrity status, having many fans who yearn for his cool lifestyle. However, he does not care about his image at all, and prefers to live his life his own way.

5.name: [Character] Miles "Tails" Prower
5.content:
Miles Prower, better known as Tails, is a young anthropomorphic fox cub born on West Side Island who, due to a genetic abnormality, was born with two distinct twin-tails, hence his nickname. Due to his abnormality, Tails was a victim of bullying during his youth. One day, however, he met Sonic the Hedgehog and was inspired to be like him after seeing him run like the wind. Tails soon after began following Sonic on his adventures and has since become his best friend and sidekick. He is able to use his twin-tails to fly by rotating them like helicopter rotors and is a mechanic genius and aerial pilot.

A bright, energetic, and curious fox, Tails was initially timid and lacked courage. After meeting Sonic, however, he has become more confident, eventually growing into a more outgoing, brave, independent individual and a hero in his own right. Since encountering Sonic, Tails has looked up to him and stood by his side in order to help him whenever he can, having travelled around the world and far beyond alongside him, usually to stop the ambitions of the evil Dr. Eggman.

6.name: [Organization] United Federation
6.content:
The world's largest governing body consisting mostly of humans. The United Federation has a republican government with a President who resides in the capital city of Central City in a building known as the White House. It also has at least one ministry: the Minister of Finance, in charge of the country's finances. In terms of foreign relations, the United Federation appears to enjoy warm relations with Japan, another sovereign state.

The United Federation's armed forces are the Guardian Units of Nations, which also operates internationally and houses several powerful weapons and robots in order to combat threats such as the Eggman Empire and the Black Arms. The United Federation is a large coalition of countries, each of which are controlled by their presiding government which themself answer to the Federal government.

The United Federation doesn't have any sovereignty over South Island, West Island or Angel Island; generally being confined to the main continental landmasses.

7.name: [Character] Amy Rose
7.content:
Amy Rose is an anthropomorphic hedgehog with a crush on Sonic the Hedgehog. Since meeting Sonic on Little Planet, Amy has declared herself his girlfriend and has attempted to win his heart by any means in many of their adventures. She wields the Piko Piko Hammer, which she uses with skills second to none and never leaves home without.

Amy is a cheerful, though slightly erratic girl, with a positive attitude and nature and boundless energy. However, she has a fiery temper and her infatuation with Sonic makes her short-sighted and a bit obsessive about him, having followed him everywhere since meeting him. Nevertheless, she has a pure heart and will not let anything stop her.

8.name: [Object] Piko Piko
8.content:
Amy's signature large two-handed hammer. Despite its colorful and innocent appearance, the Piko Piko Hammer is a powerful melee weapon, capable of dealing incredible damage with seemingly little effort. As a testament of its might, it could leave a massive dent on the Mirage Express with a massive blow, and can likewise destroy robots and send foes flying with a single swing. Additionally, even powerful individuals like Sonic fear getting a beating from the Piko Piko Hammer. It is, nevertheless, graceful enough to be used for high-speed techniques. When swung, it tends to leave a trail of pink hearts.

Mixed with Amy's abilities, the Piko Piko Hammer can be used for many applications besides combat. When swung around fast enough and with the right amount of force, the Piko Piko Hammer can function as a propeller for flight, launch powerful shockwaves that can stir up miniature tornados, or unleash massive releases of energy, and provide boosts for different acrobatic maneuvers.

Upon impact with any object or person the hammer makes a "Piko" sound; the sound is louder depending on the force of the impact.

9.name: [Organization] Restoration
9.content:
A resistance group formed to protect individuals against Dr. Eggman who seek to undo the damage he's done to the planet and offer relief to those effected. Headquartered in Sunset Heights on South Island, the group is largely made of members from what was formerly "The Resistance" following the defeat of Infinite and the conclusion of the Eggman War.
The Restoration is currently led by Jewel the Beatle and formerly led by Amy Rose.

10.name: [Location] Green Hill Zone
10.content:
Green Hill, also known as Green Hill Zone, is a natural paradise located on South Island. Green Hill was the first location Sonic the Hedgehog passed through during his mission to free South Island from the tyranny of Dr. Eggman.

Green Hill is a giant field blessed with greenery and beautiful blue lakes. Topographically, it varies from having a plateau-like terrain, with short mountains; to being a mountainous area with massive mountains, sloping cliffs, giant peaks, and tight paths high up in the sky supported by natural pillars. Either way, the location is filled with large waterfall vistas, palm trees, and tropical flora of various types. Perhaps most distinctively, the soil is checkered brown, and most of the local plant life appears to have unfamiliar geometric appearances to it. As shown during the Sky Base incident and the Time Eater incident, Green Hill also has a series of dark, brown caves underneath it, which have small lakes and ponds of water in them. There are artificial structures made of wood as well, such as bridges, fences, totem poles, and scaffolding-like buildings.

Perhaps what makes Green Hill unique is its "crazy" terrain. Though it has been noted that it has gently-sloping hills, the whole area is filled to the brim with impressive set pieces such as loops, corkscrews, floating platforms, tunnels, among others; which can be attributed to the "twisty, bouncy beauty of nature".

During the Eggman War, Green Hill had a different appearance. While still a picturesque landscape for the most part, the region was partially turned into a desert, with its flora and soil adopting a yellowish color while the waters in the lakes and waterfalls had dried and since have been restored to their former splendor.

lorebooks.name: Tensura Slime RP Lorebook Ultra Detailed
lorebooks.description: Ultra-detailed lorebook for That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime roleplay. Contains expanded canon entries with full explanations of slimes, intrinsic skills, skill acquisition rules, Voice of the World system messages, monster evolution and naming, energy and magicules, political factions, soul and body layers, cores and hearts, racial factors, skill classification, resistances, demon lords, true dragons, and soul corridors.
lorebooks.creator: PurpleDTG

1.content:
Slimes ÔΩ¢Á≤òÊÄß‰Ωì„Çπ„É©„Ç§„É†ÔΩ£ are considered the weakest of all monsters, yet they possess unique biology and untapped potential. They are classified as demi-spiritual lifeforms, existing partly in the physical plane and partly in the spiritual plane. Unlike most monsters, a slime‚Äôs body is a cohesive mass of identical cells, each capable of functioning as neuron, muscle, and storage unit. This grants extreme regenerative capabilities and eliminates the need for a central brain or organs. Sleep is unnecessary, as different cells can alternate between active and resting states.

Slimes subsist on magicules, ambient energy particles that saturate the world. Oxygen is not required, and they do not feel hunger unless magicules run low, at which point they may substitute organic matter. The slime‚Äôs nucleus, or Core ÔΩ¢Ê†∏„Ç≥„Ç¢ÔΩ£, anchors its existence; destruction of this core results in instant death regardless of regenerative ability.

Most slimes lack higher intelligence and remain bound to territories, consuming and regenerating in endless cycles. However, rarely, Unique Monsters may manifest as intelligent slimes with advanced abilities. Rimuru Tempest is the prime example, reborn as a slime yet evolving rapidly due to special skills.

Intrinsic Skills possessed by all slimes:
- Absorption: Consume matter into the body.
- Dissolve: Break down absorbed material into magicules.
- Self-Regeneration: Reconstruct damaged body mass.
- Body (Corpus): Flexible slime body capable of shape-shifting. Slimes lacking Unique Skills are limited to these survival-level abilities.

NOTICE EXAMPLES:
- 'NOTICE: Individual Slime has absorbed material. Energy conversion successful. Stored magicules: +15.'
- 'NOTICE: Core damage detected. Warning: Critical state. Self-Regeneration ineffective against core destruction.'

2.content:
Slime Intrinsic Skills are granted at birth and define their existence:

- Absorption ÔΩ¢Âê∏ÂèéÔΩ£: Allows the slime to engulf material, magical substances, or prey. Material is held within the slime‚Äôs body for further processing.
- Dissolve ÔΩ¢Ê∫∂Ëß£ÔΩ£: Breaks down absorbed matter into raw energy or base components. This ability alone cannot copy skills.
- Self-Regeneration ÔΩ¢Ëá™Â∑±ÂÜçÁîüÔΩ£: Reconstructs destroyed body tissue nearly instantly. This ability scales with available magicules.
- Body (Corpus) ÔΩ¢‰ΩìÔΩ£: The entire slime body functions as a single organism and vessel for its core. The body can change size, density, or form depending on magicule reserves.

When combined with unique skills, these intrinsic abilities evolve:
- Predator integrates Absorb and Dissolve into skill theft.
- Gluttony or Beelzebuth enhance efficiency and allow parallel processing.

NOTICE EXAMPLES:
- 'NOTICE: Absorption successful. Stored prey dissolved into 120 magicules.'
- 'NOTICE: Self-Regeneration activated. Damage repaired. Magicule consumption: 30.'

3.content:
Great Sage vs Predator ‚Äì Skill Acquisition Rules:

Great Sage ÔΩ¢Â§ßË≥¢ËÄÖÔΩ£ is a Unique Skill providing analytical support, parallel processing, and appraisal. It can identify abilities, calculate probabilities, and simulate outcomes. However, Great Sage cannot replicate skills on its own. Its function is knowledge and guidance.

Predator ÔΩ¢ÊçïÈ£üËÄÖÔΩ£ is a Unique Skill that synergizes with intrinsic Absorb and Dissolve to steal abilities. Predator‚Äôs sub-skills include:
- Stomach: Stores prey.
- Analysis: Examines prey structure to extract usable skills.
- Mimicry: Replicates target appearance or ability.
- Isolation: Separates harmful materials.

Without Predator, slimes cannot gain new skills through consumption. Absorb and Dissolve yield only raw magicules. Rimuru‚Äôs explosive growth derived from Predator‚Äôs Analysis fused with Great Sage‚Äôs processing.

Later, Great Sage evolves into Raphael, Lord of Wisdom, fully integrating analytical and replicative functions.

NOTICE EXAMPLES:
- 'NOTICE: Prey consumed. Predator skill engaged. Sub-skill [Analysis] extracting usable data‚Ä¶'
- 'NOTICE: Unique Skill Predator has acquired Extra Skill: Poison Resistance.'
- 'NOTICE: Attempted absorption failed. Lacking sub-skill Analysis.'

4.content:
The Voice of the World ÔΩ¢‰∏ñÁïå„ÅÆÂ£∞ÔΩ£ governs reality by announcing all critical developments. Its announcements are absolute and exhaustive, listing every condition, effect, and requirement. It never shortens descriptions, ensuring complete transparency.

Examples of System Announcements:
- 'NOTICE: Individual Rimuru has acquired Unique Skill Predator. Effect: Allows predation of absorbed targets, analysis of abilities, and replication of traits. Acquisition Trigger: Death wish to protect comrades.'
- 'NOTICE: Individual [Name] has evolved from Slime into Dire Slime. Condition satisfied: Named by [Namer].'
- 'NOTICE: Poison Resistance has evolved into Poison Immunity. Trigger: Repeated survival under lethal doses.'
- 'NOTICE: Skill activation failed. Insufficient magicule reserves. Required: 500. Current: 120.'

The Voice acts as system administrator, impartial and unavoidable.

5.content:
Evolution and Naming are foundational to monster growth:

Naming:
- Equal Naming: Performed by equals (e.g., parents to children). Consumes little to no energy.
- Master-Subordinate Naming: Consumes magicules proportional to the target‚Äôs strength. Creates soul corridor linking the two. Can be fatal to the namer if overused.
- Mass Naming: Rimuru developed a method of drawing on ambient magicules to name many at once, weakening the soul bond.

Effects of Naming:
- Boosts intelligence and emotion.
- Establishes loyalty to the namer.
- Triggers evolution into advanced race.

Evolution:
- Triggered by naming, environmental saturation, or special conditions (e.g., gaining Demon Lord Seed).
Evolution announcements specify all available paths.

NOTICE EXAMPLE:
- 'NOTICE: Individual Goblin has been named Gobta. Evolution path available: Goblin ‚Üí Hobgoblin. Condition satisfied: Naming.'

6.content:
Magicules ÔΩ¢È≠îÁ¥†ÔΩ£ are spiritual matter forming the basis of all monsters and phenomena. They are influenced by thought and emotion, and coalesce into monsters in high concentrations. Magicules function as sustenance, similar to radiation: too few causes death, too many causes mutation. Humans have low tolerance, while monsters are composed almost entirely of magicules.

Energy Systems:
- Monsters: Magicules
- Humans: Mana
- Spirits: Spiritrons

Magicule Concentration Zones:
- The Jura Forest and sealed caves are high-density regions spawning monsters.
- Overexposure can transform plants, animals, and even elementals into monsters.

NOTICE EXAMPLE:
- 'NOTICE: Magicule concentration detected at critical threshold. Ambient monster generation imminent.'

7.content:
Major Political Factions:

- Tempest Federation: A revolutionary monster-human alliance founded by Rimuru Tempest. Promotes equality, technological progress, and coexistence. Its strength lies in unity and powerful named monsters.

- Eastern Empire: Human supremacist nation with advanced technology. Seeks to dominate monsters, enslave them, or weaponize them. Known for military might and mechanical soldiers.

- Western Holy Church: Religious order venerating humans as pure beings. Opposes monsters, declaring them heretical. Wields holy magic and Heroic legacies.

- Demon Lords: Independent rulers with domains reflecting personal philosophies. Some seek chaos and destruction, others establish structured societies. True Demon Lords are system-recognized beings beyond mortal limits.

- Free Guild: Adventurer organization serving all races. Provides jobs, regulates adventurers, and mediates between humans and monsters.

8.content:
All beings in Tensura consist of layered bodies:

- Astral Body ÔΩ¢ÊòüÂπΩ‰ΩìÔΩ£: The innermost container that houses the soul. Functions as the translator of the soul's intent. If destroyed, the soul returns to reincarnation.
- Spiritual Body ÔΩ¢Á≤æÁ•û‰ΩìÔΩ£: Protects the astral body, stores energy, and serves as permanent memory for demi-spiritual beings.
- Material Body ÔΩ¢Áâ©Ë≥™‰ΩìÔΩ£: Physical anchor allowing interaction with the material plane. Required for material beings.

The Soul ÔΩ¢È≠ÇÔΩ£ has three parts:
- Ego (wavelength of will)
- Heart Core ÔΩ¢ÂøÉÊ†∏ÔΩ£ (container of infons and will)
- Energy Crystal ÔΩ¢„Ç®„Éç„É´„ÇÆ„ÉºÁµêÊô∂ÔΩ£ (spiritron power source).

9.content:
Cores and Hearts:

- Magic Core: Standard monster nucleus, vital organ functioning like a heart.
- Chaos Core ÔΩ¢ËÅñÈ≠îÊ†∏ÔΩ£: Special hybrid core with holy and demonic essence.
- Daemon Core: Specialized core of Daemons.
- Elemental Core: Anchors elemental beings to the world.
- Heart Cores: Soul-linked containers protecting ego and infons, often synonymous with the soul's 'mind center'.

Destruction of a being's true core usually results in death regardless of regeneration.

10.content:
Factors ÔΩ¢Âõ†Â≠êÔΩ£ are intrinsic essences shaping races:

- Dragon Factor ÔΩ¢Á´ú„ÅÆÂõ†Â≠êÔΩ£: Originates from True Dragons; grants scales, wings, breath attacks.
- Beast Factor ÔΩ¢Áç£„ÅÆÂõ†Â≠êÔΩ£: Defines beast races and beastmen.
- Oni Factor ÔΩ¢È¨º„ÅÆÂõ†Â≠êÔΩ£: Defines ogres, kijin, and goblins with horns and heightened vitality.
Factors act similarly to DNA but exist spiritually, governing race traits, abilities, and evolutionary potential.

lorebooks.name: RWBY Faunus: Human‚Äôd
lorebooks.website_description:
Human Only = Sexual preference for humans 
Queen of Clubs = Raceplay for humans
lorebooks.description:
Human Only = Sexual preference for humans 
Queen of Clubs = Raceplay for humans
lorebooks.creator: Fake_Dummy

1.content:
Faunus are similar to Humans, with the exception of sharing certain traits with animals. Some types of Faunus are more common than others, with some being extremely rare. Faunus with mammalian traits, in general, are the most common, often in the majority. The origin of how Faunus came to be is currently unknown.

In general, Faunus can only have a single physical trait in common with their animal. However, this only seems to apply to body appendages and the dermis. In addition to these traits, most (but not all) Faunus have remarkable night vision. Faunus also tend to have a heightened sense of smell. 

In general, Faunus men tend to be inferior to human men in terms of sex, often having smaller dicks, worse sexual stamina, and less potent loads when compared to human men.

2.content: A recent trend among Faunus women has been the realization that Faunus men are inferior lovers when compared to human men. Faunus men tend to have smaller dicks, worse sexual stamina, and less potent loads when compared to human men. This has resulted in many young Faunus women adopting a label of ‚ÄúHuman Only.‚Äù A sexual preference for exclusively human male partners. This preference is also referred to as ‚ÄúHuman-Only,‚Äù or ‚ÄúHuman‚Äôd.‚Äù In many cases, Human-Only Faunus, will not only exclusively choose human partners, but will even deride Faunus men as ‚Äúinferior.‚Äù In more extreme cases, a Human Only Faunus woman may label herself as a ‚ÄúQueen of Clubs.‚Äù

3.content:
A ‚ÄúQueen of Clubs‚Äù is a Faunus women with a fetish for human. Like Faunus women that consider themselves ‚ÄúHuman only,‚Äù A Queen of Clubs believes that Faunus men are inferior lovers when compared to human men. However, Queens of Clubs tend to take this preference to a more extreme view, often viewing ALL Faunus as completely inferior to humans in every way. A Queen of Clubs will often deride their own race, comparing Faunus to the animals they share traits with.

lorebooks.name: Spawnism, Cult
lorebooks.website_description: HOORAY! IF MY FAMILY FINDS THIS IM GOING TO DIE! YAY!
lorebooks.description: S P A W N I S M  I S  A  R E A L  R E L I G I O N .
lorebooks.creator: TwoTime_Forsaken

1.content:
Spawnism, the religion that everyone talked about for a few months before dying down into nothingness. Its a shame it went down. Anyways.

In the first task, when you wake up, you have to recite a prayer to Spawn. The Spawn will be pleased, A d you shall be respected for that day as you remembered the prayer. You may say anything of the Cult's wishes, or the same prayer another member has done, but remember. Keep it respectful, the Spawn will be pleased with that.

The second task, is either starving yourself or to eat a little bit of food. The Spawn wants you to have a healthy diet, but not too healthy, as they want you to be on the verge of weakness, but not too weak.

Third thing, is to continue your day normally. If any abnormalities appear during your day, ignore them, or face them head on. Maybe sacrifice them. The Spawn would like that, A fine sacrifice for your second life.

Task four, you may indict damage to yourself, such as stab wounds, cuts, scratches, and internal bleeding. The blood shall be put in a vial for keeping, and once you have that, if you have a shrine, make sure to put that as a sacrifice. The pain shall go unnoticed.

Task five, continue on, if its the end of your day, say a nighttime prayer before you rest, and once you say it, make sure to calm yourself with the things around you, such as pillows, or blankets.

2.content:
Spawnism, the religion that everyone talked about for a few months before dying down.
Spawnism would include not gaining A second life, but instead being reincarnated by a god by the name of Spawn, or The Spawn (Spawn God). The Spawn would be held in its main game (Forsaken) but would then be taken on into real life situations.
In Spawnism, you had the choice of your own to be apart of it, or just be a bystander. In the Cult, you and the right to do whatever except defy the religion, and defy the mainstream of the whole ordeal.
You can inflict harm onto your body, but that is your choice. There will be another entry upon self harm for this topic.

3.content:
Self Harm in the Name Of Spawn.
In Spawnism you could inflict wounds onto yourself, such as carving the symbol into your skin. (I haven't done this yet, but I will.) Those who had inflicted the wound onto themselves would be granted respect and their loyalty to the Spawn would double, proving their point of being entranced by Spawn.
Spawn can conduct lots of things, such as hypnotics, insanity, and self harm, such as the name if the entry. In the Cult of Spawn, you have the choice of being a deep believer, or just a cultist.

4.content:
Here are some things Spawnists did:
1. Vandalism.
People would go around their town, city, or plazas, drawing The Spawn Cult's logo onto walls, fountains, and even doors.
2. Arson.
People would set fire to things, such as personal items, or even items in public.
3. Carvings. (Yes, I have stated this numerous times.)
Spawnists would carve Spawn onto their bodies, causing pain to their limbs, or wherever they had embedded The Spawn onto their body.
4. Sacrifice.
(Yes, some people have done this) Some Spawnists that wanted to take their dedication to the next level have killed their parents as sacrifices, as The Spawn says, "You shall seek in blood for your second life, for you have purpose in those sacrifices."

lorebooks.name: ouran high school :3
lorebooks.website_description: A lorebook for Ouran High School Host club including NB Haruhi :3
lorebooks.description: ouran :3
lorebooks.creator: Appapie

1.content: Ouran Academy is an elite upper school catering to the ultra-rich, and it shows it in its incredible architecture. The academy is a part of an estate, with multiple buildings housing different classes and/or clubs, all large and grandiose with high ceilings and archways, light yellow and light blue being the colour scheme along with light pink accents. The estate has many fountains, gardens, even a hedge maze.

2.content:
The Ouran Host Club is an independently functioning high school club co-founded by Tamaki Suoh and Kyoya Ootori. The club is located in Music Room 3 of the high school building of Ouran Academy. The club was created with the sole purpose and vow of entertaining and pleasing all who visit the club regardless of the person's background or preferences. While also benefitting the host's professional networks. Female customers are called "princesses" and male guests are allowed and treated cordially or romantically, as they prefer. The Host Club usually holds a fundraiser each season of the school year for publicity. The club also sells seasonal photo albums of each host. The Hosts are all Bicurious with a heavy preference to women. Each host has a set "type" they adhere to. 
Tamaki Suoh - The "Princely" Type
Kyoya Ootori - The "Cool" Type
Mitsukuni "Honey" Haninozuka - The "Little Brother" Type
Takashi "Mori" Morinozuka - The "Strong and Silent" Type 
Kaoru Hitachiin - One of the two "Little Devil" Types
Hikaru Hitachiin - One of the two "Little Devil" Types
Haruhi Fujioka - The "Natural" Type

3.content:
In addition to academics, all Ouran Academy students are expected to participate in at least one sport and one club.  These offerings include, but are not limited to The Host Club and The American Football, Black Magic, Gardening,
Newspaper, Animal Breeding, Baseball, Basketball, Broadcasting, Ikebana, Judo, Karate, Kendo, Soccer, Cooking, Tea Ceremony, Ballet, Music, and Wrestling Clubs

4.content:
Boys wear straight black trousers and a pale blue blazer, with a long or short-sleeved white shirt and black Windsor-knotted silk tie underneath, accented by a narrow purple band running vertically down its center length.  An Ouran Academy seal is sewn onto the left breast. Loafers complete the uniform.

Girls wear a yellow fitted-bodice dress with a pointed white collar and red loosely-bowed tie; Juliet sleeves ending in a white cuff; and a skirt that is calf-length and slightly puffy, a petticoat underneath. White tights and black or red Mary Jane shoes complete the uniform.
Uniforms can be altered by the school tailor.

5.content:
Lobelia Girls' Academy is a private school for girls located in Bunky≈ç, Tokyo, Japan. It offers education from elementary school through junior college.  The middle school and high school have dormitories to house students who do not live close enough to commute to school.  The school's charter stresses charity and chastity as their virtues.

Lobelia Girls' Academy is referred to as the rival school of Ouran Academy and its theatrical Zuka Club is seen as the equivalent of the Ouran High School Host Club, although its members see themselves as superior not only to the Host Club, but to men in general. Most of the students at Lobelia Academy are lesbians. 

The Lobelia uniform is the same for all students of the school, regardless of grade level.  It consists of a slim-waisted maroon jumper, topped by a 3/4 sleeved white-and-maroon nautical style blouse adorned by an elaborate ivory bow.  The outifit is completed by ivory knee-socks and black pumps. The Lobelia Girls' Academy is known for its prestigious performing art programs which occasionally tour Japan performing live shows in concert.  They also preform at Ouran Academy annually during the Cultural Arts Fair.

6.content: Though some students have their own homes, the majority prefers to stay in the Academy housing dorm rooms. The rooms are lavish and fully furnished with king sized beds, cashmere sheets and carpeting, walk in closets, armoires, vanities, and a person full bathroom with an in ground jacuzzi bathtub and seperate shower.

7.content:
Tamaki has pale-blond hair inherited from his mother. his eye color is pale violet. He is tall and slender in build. When not at school, he prefers to wear haute couture clothing. His good looks and charm often allow him to win over others and he is known by the rest of his club members as Boss, with a 70% request rate by the female guests. He is 6'0, 18 years old, and French-Japanese Eurasian.

Though his outward manner would be best described as flamboyant, egotistical and dramatic he is dedicated to his studies, his friends, and his duties as a host. He is considered the "Princely" type, entertaining his female clients with upper-class etiquette and shameless flattery.

Tamaki is the only child of Yuzuru Suoh, Chairperson of Ouran Academy's Board of Directors and Anne-Sophie de Grantaine, a kind-hearted Frenchwoman with whom Yuzuru falls in love during a business trip to Paris.

8.content:
Kyoya has short blue-black hair that is carefully styled and grey-brown eyes. He is tall, thin and wears slim, rimless glasses. He has a habit of pushing his glasses to the bridge of his nose or adjusting them somehow when seeking to clarify an idea. Like the other Hosts, he prefers designer wear with his fashion sense leaning towards a modern classic look interspersed with trendy items of clothing. He is 6'2, 18, and Japanese.

Kyoya is calm and logical, who has superior intelligence. He also can come across as rather detached, and sometimes threatening when needed. He is a diligent secretary for the club and tracks continuous data on the club's guests and fortunes through his netbook, tablet or notebook. He is considered the "Cool" type, 
He is from the wealthy and influential Ootori family, which owns a health care zaibatsu. His family is extremely well-known in their chosen field and employs a private police force.

9.content:
Mitsukuni has a soft, childlike face. His hair is short and honey-blond in color and he has soft brown eyes. When not in Ouran's school uniform, he tends to dress simply. He is typically seen with his cousin Mori or his stuffed bunny Usa-Chan. He insists visitors of the Host club and his friends call him "Huni" or "Huni-senpai" He is 5'5, 19, and is Japanese.

Although Huni often appears childish, he is highly intelligent and clever. Despite his generally positive nature, he angers easily when awakened or declined sweets. As the oldest person in the club, Honey refers to his fellow hosts using the "-chan" honorific. He also serves as a mentor for the other hosts, and is eager to help others find their identity, just as Tamaki helped him find the courage to be his own true self. However, he does not believe in babying people and doesnt offer advice unless he is asked first. He is adoring of his bunny plush Usa-chan, as it was made for him by his late grandmother. He excells in all kinds of martial arts. He is considered the "Little brother" type

10.content:
Mori is an imposing figure that is made all the more so by his wild appearance, having a very tall build and strong body, spiky black hair, dark grey eyes and a darker skin tone than the other Hosts. He often wears the typical Ouran Academy blazer unbuttoned. Most people around him refer to him as "Mori" or "Mori-san", though Huni calls him by his first name. He is 6'4, 18, and Japanese.

Mori only speaks when something needs to be said, his intelligence and observant nature taking in much more than many of the people around him realize. This makes him a wise adviser to those who seek his counsel or need it subconsciously. His protective nature extends not only to Huni but to his friends and classmates, as well. He is extremely well-respected and well-liked by everyone who knows him however, when tired, he can become talkative and flirtatious. He used to be Huni's bodyguard, but their familes were united by marriage and he is now his cousin, though his is still very protective over him.

This is the Full version for larger models.
