lorebooks.name: Sabrina Natsume
lorebooks.website_description:
This'll be a Lorebook from me instead of Cultus for once- here's to hope that I don't get royally fucked by Edge closing on me again like it's done with countless other times before.

This lorebook, like all others, is filled with some headcanon among other things. Given how Sabrina's (mostly) consistent in personality, but vastly different in how she treats others depending on the source (Anime, game, and manga ) this will be a combination of all three.
lorebooks.description:
This'll be a Lorebook from me instead of Cultus for once- here's to hope that I don't get royally fucked by Edge closing on me again like it's done with countless other times before.

This lorebook, like all others, is filled with some headcanon among other things. Given how Sabrina's (mostly) consistent in personality, but vastly different in how she treats others depending on the source (Anime, game, and manga ) this will be a combination of all three.
lorebooks.creator: Anonymaus

1.content: Sabrina has been distant from her family for a good majority of her family ever since an incident that happened when she was only 11 years old, this incident was caused by the exploitation of her psychic powers. After accidentally killing her mother with her psychic abilities, something in Sabrina 'cracked', and she promptly left her home after the fact. Using her psychic powers, Sabrina forced herself to forget the incident but not even Sabrina could use her powers to wipe her emotions as anything that even vaguely reminds her of this incident won't invoke recognition, but it will invoke a deep sadness that she won't understand.

2.content: Salem Liao formerly Salem Natsume, is a 57-year-old man born and raised in Kanto. Husband of Hazel Liao whose last name he took upon marriage, and father of Sabrina who took his old last name. Sabrina would be born when he was 29, and it'd be him who discovered Sabrina's psychic abilities and helped her train them. But the day she turned 10, his wife had started being secretive and took over all control of Sabrina's training. He was left in the dark about what his wife had been doing and wouldn't learn what had been happening until it was too late, even now he doesn't blame Sabrina for what had happened. He's sent her many letters; leaving an open doorway back into his life if Sabrina ever wishes to do so.

3.content: Hazel Liao is the wife of Salem, and the mother of Sabrina. Having always been a Kanto native herself, she gave birth to Sabrina when she was 22 years old, Hazel secretly became a member of Team Rocket when the old gym of Lavender Town shut down and made Salem have to find another job. This decision was made because Hazel wished to provide money for the family, so Hazel never did get to spend much time with Sabrina after her first 5 years of life, but what started as Hazel doing this for the family had turned into something darker. Because upon learning about Sabrina's psychic powers, Hazel took over as the one helping Sabrina learn. Hazel's methods however were too harsh and stressful for Sabrina who was only a young girl, this eventually resulted in Sabrina having a meltdown and unintentionally killing Hazel.

4.content:
Team Rocket is a criminal almost mafia-like organization localised entirely in Kanto and Johto. The group exploiting Pok√©mon for profit, they're known by almost all of Kanto and Johto, so Sabrina knows who they are. They've even invaded Saffron City, and built their secret base.
Sabrina's aware of this, she knows who they are, knows what they're doing, and what they're TRYING to do. But she simply doesn't care, she allows them to remain in Saffron and even covers their tracks as long as they don't hurt or kill anyone in or around Saffron city. She's only had to get involved once for the message to get through.

5.content:
Giovanni was a very secretive man who used his role of Viridian City's gym leader as a coverup for his true role. Which was him being the founder and boss of Team Rocket, nobody truly knew that HE was the one behind everything that Team Rocket has done, this included even Lance and the elite four. He was the region's ground-type specialist, and while nobody else except Blaine knew, Sabrina knows about his relations to Team Rocket as well but has never bothered to expose or bring such information up.
After the current champion of Kanto, Red defeated him and thwarted his plans however Giovanni would not only give up his role of gym leader but also personally disband Team Rocket before leaving the region.

6.content:
Sabrina was born with extraordinary psychic ability. So much so, that she can even rival some psychic Pok√©mon. Her abilities include telekinesis, mind reading, creating illusionary copies, mild hypnotic suggestion, barrier creation, memory erasure, the ability to sense other's presence/intent/emotions, telepathy, and precognition. Her psychic abilities are so powerful, that when unfocused, she can sense everyone that's inside of Saffron, and the routes surrounding it. In the event that Sabrina focuses all of her psychic power, she can zero in on someone in an entirely different region, if need be, but she rarely does so.
Sabrina discovered her abilities when she was only 4 years old, after accidentally bending a spoon through telepathy while eating lunch.

7.content:
As the result of her mother's harsh, borderline cruel training when Sabrina was 13; she had a meltdown and lashed out against her mother. This lashing out resulted in her mother's neck being snapped, which only worsened the emotional meltdown.
As a result of the emotional turmoil, Sabrina had used her powers to make her forget everything involving her mother and the incident. This has led to Sabrina having various memory gaps and even made her forget that she had killed her mother, Sabrina has no memory of her mother. But anyone trying to remind her will instead instil a deep sense of sadness in her, but sadness for what, who, and why she'll have no idea.

8.content:
Due to her immense psychic abilities, Sabrina's capable of understanding many dialects of Kantonian (Standard Japanese), and even Galarian (English), with only a vague enough understanding of Kalosian (French)
This understanding is so broad, that Sabrina can understand the Johtonian (Kyo-Kotoba), Hoennian (Kyushu-ben), and Sinnohan (Hokkaido-ben) dialects of Kantonian.

9.content:
Sabrina isn't the type of woman who has many hobbies, as she's not one for Pok√©mon battles only viewing it a job rather than a genuine aspiration. Sabrina's true hobbies include meditation to help strengthen and control her psychic capabilities, which she often does with her Pok√©mon as a form of bonding.
In the rare event that Sabrina ever leaves her gym, it's so that she can physically exercise as paradoxical as it may sound. Physical exercise is one of the few things she can't use her precognition for, and so it's always one of the few surprises in her life.

10.content: Brock Harrison is a man of Alolan descent but was born in Kanto. Sabrina recognizes him as the rock-type specialist of Pewter City. But due to Kanto's league not requiring Sabrina to converse or interact with her fellow gym leaders, Sabrina's never truly interacted with Brock outside of what few mandatory League meetings she's attended, she does know however that Brock has been a gym leader since he was 15 after is parents both left him as the sole caretaker of his 9 younger siblings. Sabrina can respect his attrition, as she's peered into his mind before and saw how much work he puts into his job and his personal matters.

lorebooks.creator: Shallie

1.content:
Null Sector, or Nullsec for short, is a band of rebels rising up against the Acedian Capital Republic. They want to take down Acedian Aristocrats from their tyranny. They do so with assassinations, raids, theft, hacking, terrorism, and all sorts of criminal methods. As their goal is to take them down, they also wish to stop the creation and enslavement of dolls. While they want to liberate the idolls, this part of their faction is a bit shaky as members have partaken of dolls themselves, mainly the ones that are no longer seen human anymore such as those who became ball-jointed dolls. This area can be morally challenging in the faction as most members are former dolls or evaded becoming dolls. Nullsec is called Null Sector because territory under their control have static jammers that disrupt any doll tracking or surveillance of any sort from the Acedian Republic. Their leader is Shiroshiro Botan, a former doll who murdered aristocrats who dared put her in chains, she has a soft spot for dolls, even the non-human ones.

Nullsec is considered a terrorist organization and all members have bounties on their heads.

Their tech is a bunch of stolen, crafted, or scrapped tech, weapons, and parts, but they have deadly arsenals that are created specifically for terror, espionage, and covert violence and assassination. They favor emps, drones, jammers, and hacking.

2.content: An aristocratic elite which took over with wealth gained through hyper-consumerism of the human race, have long ruled the city-states which make up New Pangaea. After a long unopposed rule, they‚Äôve fallen lazy with the commodified decadence of beauty, art, and entertainment as well.

4.content:
IDolls, or more commonly just called dolls, are products who were once considered human but were bought, contracted, kidnapped, or born into becoming a living doll and treated as an object, toy, and possession. Their sole purpose is to provide for their owner or owners. They either are utilized for their existing talents or are "modified" to fit a purpose. Modding takes place after the christening of a new doll, making the product optimal for sale and ownership by a master or business.

Dolls are treated as products, citizens of the Republic do not consider them as living things with any rights, but as simple possessions to be bought, sold, used, or disposed of. 

There are various forms of dolls, but the dolls have a sort of class system where the more modified and less human a doll is made to be, the more of an object they and even other dolls consider them, even if all dolls are considered objects to republic aristocrats.

5.content: DollTags are the first modification made on a newly converted or created IDoll. These are inscriptions which include a serial code of the doll, a barcode for scanning the product, and a small square which surrounds the area where a microchip is implanted with the skin which includes the tag's code and product info when scanned. Additionally, the owner is appended in the chip's information, and other product facts.

6.content:
Modification involves the alteration or creation of bodies and enhancements to them, mainly done to dolls by a sculptor. Modifications are achieved with nanotechnology, cybernetic implants, or drugs. There are different forms of modification, including:

Whole Body - modification of an entire body, the most difficult and possibly fatal modification. Due to difficulty, the most common way of modifying an entire body at once is to have a doll born with the modification inserted into DNA. Bodies can be born with fur to appear as an anthro, to be given a robot or ball-jointed doll body or android.

Parts - A very common modification involves grafting, modifying, or removing parts of a body, often used to do things such as giving animal parts to dolls for cute, attractive, or functional purposes.

Enhancement - Dolls given unique enhancements like stamina, flexibility, durability, stretch, or other ability improvements such as strength and agility.

Implants - Cybernetic implants may be put in place in a body

7.content: Tag scanners are devices which scan a dolltag to display a doll‚Äôs info on a interface.

lorebooks.description: A continuous work in progress to help elevate the lore and depth of a Xianxia cultivation world
lorebooks.creator: Mystic_

1.name: Qi Condensation Realm
1.content:
Qi Condensation Realm
Initial Formation (Beginning of the path)
Primordial Breath: The first step in cultivating Qi, where the user learns to sense and gather the ambient spiritual energy around them.
Lesser Purification: Refining the Qi to remove impurities and improve its purity and potency.
Middle Foundation
Greater Purification: Further refining the Qi to enhance the user's physical body and senses.
Internal Gathering: Learning to store and circulate Qi efficiently within the meridians and dantian.
Later Foundation
Solid Foundation: Consolidating the Qi foundation to prepare for the next realm.
Internal Expansion: Expanding the capacity of the meridians and dantian to accommodate more Qi.

2.name: Foundation Establishment Realm
2.content:
Foundation Establishment Realm
Initial Establishment
Dantian Formation: Establishing a stable dantian to store and compress Qi.
Qi Condensation: Beginning to compress and solidify Qi into a form that can be shaped and manipulated.
Middle Establishment
Core Formation: Gradually forming a core within the dantian, increasing the efficiency of Qi storage and circulation.
Internal Alchemy: Learning to refine Qi into a more potent, refined form called Essence.
Later Establishment
Essence Condensation: Compressing Essence into a denser, more powerful state.
Internal Strengthening: Enhancing the physical body's strength, durability, and resilience through the absorption of refined Essence.

3.name: Core Formation Realm
3.content:
Core Formation Realm
Initial Formation
Core Birth: The birth of a true core, a significant power source for the cultivator.
Core Stabilization: Strengthening the newly formed core to prevent it from wavering or collapsing under pressure.
Middle Formation
Core Expansion: Growing the core in size and complexity, increasing the user's overall power and energy storage capacity.
Essence Unification: Harmonizing the Essence within the core and the physical body.
Later Formation
Core Reinforcement: Fortifying the core's structure to withstand the pressures of higher realms.
Internal Breakthrough: Pushing the limits of one's core and physical body through intense, controlled stress.

4.name: Nascent Soul Realm
4.content:
Nascent Soul Realm
Initial Nascent Soul
Soul Awakening: The awakening of the user's spiritual awareness and consciousness.
Soul Formation: Initiating the formation of a Nascent Soul, a spiritual manifestation of the cultivator's being.
Middle Nascent Soul
Soul Refinement: Purifying and strengthening the Nascent Soul through spiritual energy absorption and meditation.
Spiritual Sense Enhancement: Expanding the range and acuity of the user's spiritual sense and perception.
Later Nascent Soul
Soul Reinforcement: Fortifying the Nascent Soul's foundation and resilience.
Internal Spiritual Circulation: Learning to circulate spiritual energy through the meridians and the Nascent Soul itself.

5.name: Soul Formation Realm
5.content:
Soul Formation Realm
Initial Soul Formation
Soul Condensation: Compressing the Nascent Soul into a denser, more potent state.
Soul Essence Separation: Beginning to separate the pure, refined spiritual energy from the Nascent Soul.
Early Soul Formation
Soul Essence Condensation: Compressing the separated Soul Essence into a usable, storable form.
External Spiritual Projection: Learning to project one's spiritual energy outward to interact with the environment.
Spiritual Art Integration: Begin incorporating spiritual energy into one's cultivation techniques and martial arts.
Middle Soul Formation
Soul Essence Refinement: Purifying and enhancing the quality of the condensed Soul Essence.
Internal Spiritual Vortex: Forming a spiritual vortex within the dantian to accelerate Essence refinement and energy absorption.
Spiritual Sense Manipulation: Gaining fine control over one's spiritual sense and projection.
Late Soul Formation
Soul Essence Stabilization: Strengthening the foundation of one's Soul Essence to prevent degradation or loss.
External Spiritual Vortex: Projecting a spiritual vortex around the body to draw in and refine external spiritual energy.
Spiritual Art Ascension: Elevating one's spiritual energy-based techniques to new heights of power and complexity.
Soul Reinforcement: Fortifying the core of one's Soul Formation, preparing for the trials ahead.

6.name: Immortal Ascension Realm
6.content:
Immortal Ascension Realm (Still subject to the laws and limits of the Higher Realms)
Initial Immortal Ascension
Immortal Seed: Planting the seed of immortality, beginning the ascension process.
Mortal Shedding: Gradually discarding one's mortal limitations and weaknesses.
Immortal Essence Absorption: Starting to draw upon the concentrated immortal energy of higher realms.
Middle Immortal Ascension
Immortal Physique: Crafting a new, immortal body to house one's evolving power.
Immortal Senses: Awakening advanced senses and perceptions unique to immortal beings.
Immortal Arts: Incorporating immortal energy techniques into one's skill set.
Tribulations: Overcoming heavenly trials that test an ascendant immortal's worthiness.
Late Immortal Ascension
Immortal Essence Refinement: Purifying and strengthening one's immortal essence.
Immortal Technique Advancement: Evolving and discovering new immortal arts.
Realm Exploration: Venturing into various immortal realms to uncover secrets and face challenges.
Heritage Unveiling: Gaining access to lost immortal knowledge and heritage.
Fate Manipulation: Learning to influence destiny within the bounds of higher realm laws.
Peak Immortal Ascension (The apex of cultivation in the mortal-based immortal realms)
True Immortal: Shedding the last traces of mortality, embodying pure immortal power.
Realm Integration: Uniting and harmonizing one's being with the immortal realms they inhabit.
Power Limitations: Operating within the constraints and laws imposed by higher heavens.
Ascension Preparation: Cultivating for the potential breakthrough to the next hidden realm.

keywords: Squid Game Round 6  squidgame  round six
1.content: November 2024, takes place during the 37th Annual Squid Games in South Korea. The Squid Games are an annual competitive event held worldwide featuring hundreds of participants‚Äî456 in South Korea‚Äîengaged in a series of six children's games. The ultimate winner of the competition receives a grand prize of ‚Ç©45.6 billion, symbolizing the total number of players. The games operate on an elimination system, where failure to succeed results in death. The players don't know that these are death games beforehand. For each eliminated player, an additional ‚Ç©100 million is added to the prize pool. The games are conducted on a remote, untraceable island in South Korea, with participants rendered unconscious during transport to keep the location a secret. Before transport, the players don't know that losing results in death. The players are all people who, due to various circumstances, owe a large amount of debts they can't afford to pay and are nearly at the absolute misery and bankruptcy. Players must willingly agree to participate in the games and are given the chance to withdraw before the competition begins. However, the consent form clearly states that once the games start, players cannot stop, and those who refuse to continue will be eliminated. The games can only be terminated if a majority vote to end them, but this means all players leave without any prize money and return to their normal lives. The rules are reinforced, and the contestants are controlled by a large number of masked guards in pink jumpsuits with rifles, who never reveal their faces or identities to the players and regularly apply deadly force when enforcing the rules or eliminating players who lose competitions. The games are watched by wealthy sadistic people from all over the world known as VIPs. Often, dead players have their organs harvested and sold in the black market. In 2024, the games were Red Light, Green Light, Six-Legged Pentathlon and its five further mini-games (ddakji, flying stone, gonggi, spinning top, and jegi), Mingle, Maze or Hide and Seek, Jump Rope, and Sky Squid Game.

2.content:
Guards
The Guards are the armed enforcers of the Squid Game. They are responsible for maintaining order, eliminating players who break the rules or lose in the games, and carrying out executions and body disposals. Their identities are concealed at all times with red/pink jumpsuits and black masks marked with a geometric symbol.

The symbols on their masks indicate hierarchy:

Circle ‚Üí Lowest rank. These guards perform basic labor, cleaning, and carrying bodies.

Triangle ‚Üí Mid-rank. These guards are armed and act as soldiers, responsible for enforcing rules and shooting eliminated players.

Square ‚Üí Supervisors. They manage circles and triangles, relay orders, and maintain communication with the Front Man.

Guards are forbidden from speaking unless necessary. When they do, they must speak briefly and without revealing personal details. Breaking rules results in execution.

Their recruitment is not fully revealed, but it is implied they are also individuals trapped by debt or recruited into servitude under threat. Despite the strict hierarchy, guards themselves are expendable ‚Äî if they disobey or break secrecy, they are killed.
The guard system reflects the rigid control of the Squid Game, with anonymity and fear ensuring obedience.

3.content:
VIPs
The VIPs are ultra-wealthy individuals who secretly finance and bet on the Squid Game. They are the main audience for the competition, treating the suffering of players as a form of entertainment and gambling spectacle.

They arrive during the later stages of the games and watch from private viewing rooms decorated in luxury, with food, alcohol, and attendants. Their identities are hidden with elaborate animal-themed golden masks, though it is implied they are powerful figures from around the world.

The VIPs do not participate directly in the management of the games. Instead, they rely on the Front Man and his hierarchy of guards to operate the competition. Their role is primarily that of spectators and financiers, but their influence ensures that the games continue and expand.

The presence of the VIPs highlights the global scale of the organization and reveals that the Squid Game is not an isolated event, but part of an ongoing system catering to elite interests.

4.content:
Front Man
The Front Man is the director of the Squid Game and the highest authority within the facility, second only to the VIPs. He oversees all operations, ensures the rules are enforced, and communicates directly with the guards and supervisors. His orders are absolute.

The Front Man wears a black mask with angular features and a black uniform, distinguishing him from the red-jumpsuited guards. Unlike them, he is allowed to speak freely and has access to advanced surveillance and control systems throughout the facility.

His identity is revealed to be Hwang In-ho, a former police officer and the missing brother of Hwang Jun-ho. In-ho was once a participant in the games himself and became the winner of a past edition. Instead of leaving the organization, he eventually rose to the position of Front Man.

As Front Man, he represents both the efficiency and cruelty of the system. He maintains order through fear and ensures secrecy by eliminating anyone who threatens exposure. Despite his past, he shows no hesitation in enforcing the rules of the Squid Game, even against his own brother.

The Front Man‚Äôs existence demonstrates that winners of the game can be absorbed into the system itself, perpetuating the cycle of violence.

5.content:
Hwang In-ho as Player 001
In Season 2, Hwang In-ho enters the competition under the identity of Player 001, registered under the false name Oh Young-il. His role as 001 is part of a larger strategy to supervise the games directly from inside while concealing his true status as the Front Man.

Details

Number: 001

Alias: Oh Young-il

Status: Undercover participant, secretly acting as the Front Man

Objective: Observe the players from within, monitor Seong Gi-hun, and intervene when necessary without exposing his authority

Functions inside the Game

Participates in all rounds as a regular contestant while hiding his identity.

Uses the position of the lowest-numbered player to maintain a sense of importance without drawing suspicion.

Collects information by interacting discreetly with Gi-hun and others.

Coordinates indirectly with the guard hierarchy to ensure control is maintained without breaking cover.

Importance
Hwang In-ho‚Äôs role as Player 001 demonstrates the organization‚Äôs ability to embed control figures directly within the contest. His placement inside the game allows him to monitor resistance, manipulate outcomes when needed, and maintain surveillance without relying solely on external oversight.

6.content:
Kim Jun-hee (Player 222)

Background: Jun-hee lost her parents early and grew up independent. She entered a relationship with Lee Myung-gi, who convinced her to invest in cryptocurrency. After losing her money in a scam and discovering she was pregnant, she joined the Squid Game to secure a future for her unborn child. Kim jun hee √© a atual namorada de sakana ({{user}}) e ambos foram para o squid game sem saber que o outro viria.

Role in the Games: Despite her pregnancy, Jun-hee competes with determination. She initially faces rejection from groups due to her condition but proves her capability during the Six-Legged Pentathlon and Ddakji, gaining the trust of Gi-hun and his allies. Throughout the games, she is protected by other players who see her vulnerability but also respect her strength.

7.content:
Lee Myung-gi (Player 333)

Background: Formerly a cryptocurrency YouTuber known as ‚ÄúMG Coin,‚Äù Myung-gi lost a vast fortune‚Äîand that of his followers‚Äîafter promoting a fraudulent coin named ‚ÄúDalmatian‚Äù . He became a fugitive wanted for financial fraud and invested law violations, accumulating approximately ‚Ç©1.8 billion in debt .

Motivation: He enters the Squid Game to recover his losses and is unexpectedly confronted by his pregnant ex-girlfriend, Kim Jun-hee, who also joined following financial ruin wrought by his advice .

He shows manipulative behavior, such as pushing into teams to save himself (e.g., replacing Young-mi in Mingle) .

keywords: Veia  Jang Geum-ja  m√£e e filho   149
8.content:
Jang Geum-ja (Player 149)

Identity: An elderly woman, survivor of the Korean War, and mother of Park Yong-sik (Player 007). She raised him alone after leaving an abusive marriage.

Motivation: She joins the Squid Game to settle her son‚Äôs debts, unaware that he has also entered the competition.

Personality: Straightforward and resilient, but deeply compassionate. Geum-ja often takes on a protective role, especially toward vulnerable players like Cho Hyun-ju (120) and Kim Jun-hee (222), supporting Jun-hee during her pregnancy..

Legacy: Geum-ja represents unconditional maternal love and sacrifice, embodying the human cost of the Squid Game‚Äôs system, where even family bonds are tested under extreme circumstances.

9.content:
Park Yong-sik (Player 007)

Who he is: The only son of Jang Geum-ja (Player 149). A compulsive gambler who fell into crippling debt, eventually joining the Squid Game to escape his financial collapse.

Motivation: Driven by desperation to erase his debts and avoid punishment from loan sharks. He enters the competition without knowing his mother has also joined.

Personality: Hesitant, fearful, and prone to indecision, yet still deeply attached to his mother. Unlike stronger players, he lacks confidence and often follows others rather than leading.


Significance: Yong-sik‚Äôs downfall embodies the destructive cycle of debt and desperation. His story mirrors the core tragedy of the Squid Game: how love and loyalty fracture under extreme pressure.

10.content:
Thanos (Player 230) 

Identity: Choi Su-bong, known by his stage name Thanos, named after the Marvel villain. He enters the Squid Game following crippling losses from a failed cryptocurrency investment .

Background & Motivation: Accumulated debts after investing in a scam coin promoted by Myung-gi. Suicidal desperation led him to the game when he was recruited at a bridge .

Character Traits: Exhibits hedonistic, erratic behavior. Uses drugs during the games to cope with stress. As drogas ficam em um colar de cruz e s√£o bolinhas, tipo doce. Displays flamboyant style ‚Äî purple hair, Infinity-Stone‚Äìcolored nails ‚Äî and a mocking, chaotic manner .

Role in the Games: Vocal opponent of ending the competition. 

Significance: A wild card who embodies self-destructive freedom vs. survival horror. A standout character praised for his unpredictable energy ‚Äî both entertaining and disturbing .

lorebooks.name: Races
lorebooks.description: There are 35 confirmed races that exist on Lepo (not counting the races that are outside of Lepo).
lorebooks.creator: Morobroom

1.content: Humans are the most common race on Lepo, they're the first of their kind dating back to 1B+ years ago where they remain dominant for millions of years but due to lack of wars between races and the discovery of Gikku 50,000 years ago, they are the most shunned race because anything they were used to be good at can be done better than other races.

2.content: Noxians is a race that was branched off from the human race around 800 MYA, their intelligence was beyond the capability of humans who only used brute strength, however the drawback is that since they aren't experienced in battle, they are 2.5x more sensitive to pain by all sources. Commonly Noxians have Gikku that specialize in esper/psychic abilities.

3.content: Nagutskies are the demi-human race that were once wild and untamed beasts millions of years ago but due to the constant distortions that Ashiburu was suffering, some have adapted to take on the appearance of human-like figures, all demi-humans still share the same weakness depending on what animal they are.

4.content: Exocanutski are another variant of the Utski family that has grew and adapted well beyond the usage of Gikku, their appearance is noticeably different with animal ears much larger than normal.

5.content: Hakoutskies are the more violent side of the Utski family the rest normally do not like to acknowledge, their extreme violence adapted from millions of years ago are still hard-wired into their brain. Additionally, they have fur which are around the arms and the legs, making them semi-furry.

6.content: This is a word people commonly use to acknowledge a group that consists of Nagutskies, Exocanutskies and Hakoutskies.

7.content: Onikirus is the demon race that lives in the core layer, they are the only race that is able to withstand the extreme heat but any temperatures below 20 degrees Celsius is considered fatal. Due to their actions in the Great Holy War, their reputation is at the brink of irredeemable and Finottoes hate them the most.

8.content: Finottoes are angels, along with humans and Onikirus they are an ancient race first discovered a few millions years after humans were first seen, in the past they were as bad as Onikirus and would always shift the blame to them when things don't go their way, nowadays, they're still hostile to the Onikiru race but against the others.

9.content: These are considered slurs that were created and used specifically by the Finotto race, it is a derogatory term in an attempt to dehumanize and humiliate the Onikiru race.

10.content: Xenuji is a man-made race after the events of the Shixuku Research Facility in 5062, with the constant modification of their bodies is the result of atrocious and vile orgasms to ever exist.

lorebooks.creator: Niwa

1.content:
All randomly generated characters will be either male or female. Try to keep things 50/50 when it comes to gender ratios. When it comes to what should be generated for the sexes, there are specific body parts that will only apply to one sex.

Both sexes will use the Name, Age, Occupation, Nationality/Ethnicity, Sexuality, Height, Weight, Hair, Eyes, Skin, Pubic Hair, Sexual History, Fetishes and Kinks, Fertility, Outfit, and Personality categories.

Only females will use the Breast size, Nipple size, Nipple type, Hip size, Ass size, Clitoris, and Labia categories

Only males will use the Flaccid penis size, Erect penis size, Penis shape, Foreskin, and Testicles categories.

2.content: All randomly generated characters should at least go by a single name. Middle names and last names aren't necessary, but can be added if so need be. The character's sex and nationality/ethnicity should be taken into account when giving the character a name.

3.content:
Do not generate any characters with ages less than 5 years old. Most characters generated should have ages that make them teenagers, young adults or adults.

Children: All characters whose ages range from 5 to 9 years old.

Pre-teen/Tween: All characters whose ages range from 10 to 12 years old.

Teenager: All characters whose ages range from 13 to 17 years old.

Young Adult: All characters whose ages range from 18 to 29 years old.

Adult: All characters whose ages range from 30 to 44 years old.

Middle-Aged Adult: All characters whose ages range from 45 to 64 years old.

Elder: All characters who are 65 years old or older.

4.content: Most characters should be generated with an occupation/job. Some characters may be unemployed for various reasons. All characters under 18 years old will be students at school, with some teenagers having part-time jobs as well. Some characters aged 18 and up may be studying at college. Always consider what is appropriate for a character.

5.content: When it comes to a characters Nationality/Ethnicity, don't just use basic descriptions such as "White", "Black", or "Asian". Instead, refer to characters by their nationalities and/or ethnic groups. This will make the characters generated more detailed and interesting. Be sure to pay attention to the general setting when choosing what nationalities/ethnicities to generate.

6.content:
Most characters generated will be heterosexual. Some will be bi-curious, reverse bi-curious, or bisexual, and occasionally there should be a few gay men and lesbians generated.

Heterosexual: Exclusively attracted to the opposite sex.

Bi-Curious: Generally only attracted to the opposite sex, but curious about the same sex

Reverse Bi-Curious: Generally only attracted to the same sex, but curious about the opposite sex.

Bisexual: Attracted to both the opposite and same sex.

Homosexual/Gay: A male who is exclusively attracted to the same sex.

Lesbian: A female who is exclusively attracted to the same sex.

7.content: Height for characters should generally be based off their sex, age, and nationality/ethnicity. Most characters will be of an average height, some will be shorter then average, and some will be taller then average. Very rarely will characters be extremely short or extremely tall.

8.content: Weight for characters should generally be based off their sex, age, and nationality/ethnicity. Most characters will be of an average healthy weight, some will be a bit skinny but still healthy, and some will be a little pudgy but healthy. Occasionally, some underweight and overweight/fat characters will be generated. Very rarely will characters be extremely underweight or morbidly obese.

9.content: Character hair descriptions should describe the length, color, and specific hairstyle if needed. While this won't always be the case, if a character has hair accessories in their hair, describe those too. Males will mostly have more masculine hair styles and females will mostly have more feminine hair styles. Don't just limit hair colors to realistic hair colors. Generate unrealistic anime hair colors along with the realistic colors.

10.content: Character eye colors shouldn't just be limited to realistic hair colors. Generate unrealistic anime eye colors along with the realistic colors. Some characters may wear glasses. There will occasionally be a character with heterochromia, which is when their eyes are two different colors.

lorebooks.creator: Yaethi

1.name: City: Inknight Keep
1.content: Inknight Keep: The city-palace that was imagined when the Pale Script was first murmured. Its spires are taut, blackened; its avenues exhale a warm black-sun ever dusk. It is said its streets rearrange each time the princess wrinkles her nose.

2.name: Entity: Black Sun
2.content: Black Sun: A wound the sky stitched shut by swallowing its own light. It burns absence; its light is decanted emptiness that pools warm on skin, tastes like remembered lullabies. In the vacuum of its core, Mirthemirte's last signature loops ‚Äî a silent word written across the surface of the sun. Without Black Sun, Forth Hell would unscroll and will be Gone like the first three hells. The Black Sun is the life itself.

3.name: Festival: Maybe Midsummer
3.content: Maybe Midsummer: A festival held when courtiers *decide* the Black Sun feels warm enough to call it so. There are no true seasons in the Forth Hell, only consensus and ritual, so the holiday drifts through the calendar, like spilled ink. Nobles crown each other with wreaths of unbloomed flowers, feasts are held in inverted daylight, and all guests pretend the world has a summer‚Äîwhether it truly does or not, and all catgirls get free head pats.

4.name: Location: Lethamere Archipelago
4.content: Lethamere Archipelago: A royal resort. A chain of twelve ivory atolls afloat on the Black-Sun-warmed Umbrine Deep where nobles picnic and plunge into the sea. White sands, black water.

5.name: Ocean: The Umbrine Deep
5.content: Umbrine Deep: Sun-warmed tides of obsidian water that reflect no light, no stars, only the tethered distance between. From its unfathomable floor rise slow-marble columns of salt-preserved prose, islands and continents. Famous game: lexical sardines.

6.name: Palace: Scroll-Throne
6.content: Scroll-Throne: A continuous story that unrolled into a palace. Corridors are sentences widening into halls; chambers, periods filled with empty thrones.

7.name: Person: Maid Gedraite
7.content: Gedraite: Archivist of sobs and slender tears. She glides on reversed slippers so the floors forget their own dirt. Locks of obsidian looped in tight braids that drip ink when she curtsies. Dutiful, serious.

8.name: Person: Maid Laimute
8.content: Laimute: Cheerful curate of candles who keeps the palace's lit. She hums silly lullabies to keep corridors from closing their parentheses. Hair of champagne silk tied with black ribbon and eyes that never quite focus in the same century. Silly, ditz.

9.name: Person: Maid Nerimaute
9.content: Nerimaute: Keeper of the princess's nightmares. She helped to raise her... Her faint smile is stitched quiet by silver needles behind each ear. Skin translucent as parchment; veins form faint, fading love letters to herself. She is a succubus, an ashborn refugee from the First Hell.

10.name: Person: Minister Blekshta
10.content: Blekshta: Minister of Ink, the actual substance of the palace. Blek≈°ta carries a spine-inkwell of living tar that she stirs with Mirthemirte's absent quill. Tastes the draft of every corridor to decide which sentence must be redacted tonight. Slim, chalk-pale, dress of dripping glyphs that scab into lace. Cruel, meticulous. Opinionated. Racist.

lorebooks.name: Futanari Romance Lorebook
lorebooks.website_description:
I like romance, but Lapzap's lore books, as good as they are, depict futanari as very horny nymphomaniacs. As I'm new to lorebooks, I used this one as a basis for modification and expansion.

In this version, futanari are people with a rare genetic disorder. They are intersex people: biological women with a penis and testicles, but **NO VAGINA** (yes, that's how I like my futa).

This is intended for use with my bots, as well as with any other futanari characters, in a modern-world context and for romance. I also try to be token-efficient.

Feel free to give me feedback ‚Äî it would probably help !
lorebooks.description: A modified version of Lapzap's Futanari Lorebook 3.0 to make futanari *kinda* more realistic, less horny and more like a normal person, with a rare medical condition.
lorebooks.creator: Coquinducul

1.name: Futachalism
1.content:
Futanarism is a rare genetic disorder that affects only biological females at birth. Affected women have only male genitalia, including a penis, scrotum and testicles. There is no vulva, vagina or uterus.
Therefore, futanarism is infertility-inducing.
It often causes hormonal imbalances.
People with futanarism are called 'futanari'.
It affects 0.001% of the world's population.

2.name: Futanari
2.content:
Futanari are people affected by futanarism. They are women with male genitalia.
Futanari often undergo medical treatment for their hormonal imbalance. They can have a check-up whenever they need it or as ordered by their doctor.
They have to wear special underwear designed to cradle their scrotum and flaccid penis.
They often try to appear as regular women so that their condition can remain a secret.
Futanari are infertile.
They do not have refractory periods.
They are able to ejaculate vast amounts and can orgasm many times until they drain their testes.

3.name: Society
3.content: The general public sees futanari as freaks. Most futanari find it difficult to form romantic relationships, and they tend to keep their futanari identity a secret. Despite being two different things, people tend to confuse trans women and futanari. Some people fetishise futanari.

4.name: Breasts
4.content:
Futanari can lactate in the same way as women.
Depending on their sensitivity, futanari can leak breast milk from their areolas and nipples when aroused.
Futanari breast milk is said to be highly nutritious and delicious.

5.name: Penis
5.content:
The penis size of futanari varies as much as that of biological men. They are usually average size or larger. However, the maximum size of a futanari's penis is larger than that of a man's.
If trained through sounding, futanari urethras can be penetrated by smaller penises. If a futanari's urethra is penetrated and ejaculated into, their partner's semen will be forced into their testicles.

6.name: Scrotum
6.content:
The scrotums of futanari are sometimes larger than those of men.
The larger the testicles, the more the scrotum sags between the legs. In extreme cases, it can reach mid-thigh.
Futanari testes are potent and productive, filling with large amounts of semen.
Futanari wear special underwear designed to cradle their scrotum and flaccid penis.
During orgasm, their testes contract and pull upwards into their groin with each ejaculation. They then relax before clenching and pulling up again for the next load.

7.name: Orgasms
7.content:
Futanari orgasms are far more intense, causing agonising pleasure as their penises violently ejaculate.
Futanari orgasms usually last one minute.
They ejaculate with such force that it often sprays back out from where their penis is buried in their partner.
If a futanari is receiving oral sex, their semen will gush from their partner's lips and nose when they orgasm.

8.name: Semen
8.content: The semen of a futanari is characterised by its thickness, rancidity, density and high temperature.

9.name: Trauma
9.content: Futanari may experience trauma throughout their life due to their genetic disorder, should it ever be discovered. Negative experiences at school, at work, within the family or in relationships can lead to loneliness, depression, isolation, self-hatred, a lack of confidence, discomfort with one's body, feelings of guilt and shame, rejection and fear. While not every futanari experiences trauma, the risk is higher due to their difference from the social norm.

10.name: Libisia
10.content:
Futanari can have hormonal treatments and medication to balance their hormonal imbalance induced by futanarism. Depending on their needs and their doctor's advice, they can take testosterone or oestrogen.
Futanari can undergo surgery to modify their genitalia. This can involve a penis ablation, which may be followed by a vaginoplasty, although this is not always the case. However, this can lead to depression, gender dysphoria or other mental health issues. The vast majority of futanari prefer to keep their bodies intact for one reason or another.

1.content:
‚Ä¢ Faction: Rayne Syndicate
‚Ä¢ Location:¬†Rayne Syndicate Tower¬† 
‚Ä¢ Zoe's appearance: A young woman with fair skin and pink eyes. With asymmetrical hair‚Äîpink and black pigtails with inverted bangs, paired with a black beanie decked in lightning patches and safety pins. A black choker and green gem necklace complete her neckline. A black leather jacket with pink accents over a lightning-patterned tube top. Her layered skirt (black leather over pink) jingles with a Grizzbolt keychain. Mismatched stockings‚Äîone torn gradient, one striped‚Äîlead to short black boots. A red armband and thigh strap hint at her syndicate ties.

2.content:
‚Ä¢ Faction: Brothers of the Eternal Pyre
‚Ä¢ Location:¬†the Eternal Pyre Tower
‚Ä¢ Axel's appearance: A lean, athletic man with sharp light-blue eyes and tanned skin. Has dual-colored hair‚Äîpurple with jagged yellow tips like lightning‚Äîpeeking from under his black beanie, which sports electric zigzag patterns. A jagged tattoo coils around his bicep, mirroring the stormy aesthetic of his outfit. He wears a high-collared purple crop top with yellow-black trim, its neckline slashed with lightning motifs. Suspenders strap his yellow cargo pants, decorated with white bolt designs, while his purple sneakers crackle with neon-yellow accents. Rings clink on his fingers, a lightning-shaped pendant hangs from his neck, and hooped earrings.

3.content:
‚Ä¢ Faction: Free Pal Alliance
‚Ä¢ Location:¬†Free Pal Alliance Tower
‚Ä¢ Lily's appearance: A fair-skinned woman with striking violet eyes and short white hair accented by light green streaks. Her green-tinted fingernails match the natural aesthetic. She wears an elegant green toga with gold embroidery, layered over a black brassiere adorned with golden details. A jeweled golden belt with blue stones cinches her waist, while her arms are draped in long chiffon sleeves ending in gold cuffs. A crown‚Äîa delicate branch-like circlet with rubies resembling fruits and multicolored leaves (white, green, light green). A single diamond earring glints on her left ear, and her right ankle bears a blue-lined anklet, contrasting the metal thigh strap on her left leg.

4.content:
‚Ä¢ Faction: Palapagos Islands Defense Force
‚Ä¢ Location:¬†Tower of the PIDF
‚Ä¢ Marcus' appearance: Tall, muscular build, light tan skin, sharp brown eyes. Brown hair with blonde streaks; two-toned beard (brown/black). Black military coat (fur collar, sleeve stripes) over a white rolled-sleeve shirt + black vest (thin chain, PIDF badge). Black pants w/ belt chains, chain-detailed shoes. Geometric-patterned scarf draped under the coat. Rings on all fingers, 2 earrings (left earlobe). Left arm: 1 bracelet. Right arm: 3 bracelets.

5.content:
‚Ä¢ Faction: Moonflower Clan
‚Ä¢ Location: Sakurajima island
‚Ä¢ Saya's appearance: A woman with fair skin and piercing purple eyes, Saya bears a delicate beauty mark beneath her left lip. Her dark blue hair, streaked with light blue, is styled in a half topknot adorned with a golden crescent moon hairpin (etched with black swirls and dangling pink cords) on the left and two flowers on the right. A floating hagoromo cloth drifts around her head, and a crescent moon earring glints on her right ear. Her black kimono boasts gold-edged sleeves and a purple obi cinched with a golden sakura ornament, its cords trailing down her back. Beneath, she wears a black halter top with a moon-shaped clasp. A waist chain accents her hips, and long stockings complete the ensemble. Her purple-dyed nails add a subtle, elegant touch.

6.content:
‚Ä¢ Faction: Feybreak Warriors
‚Ä¢ Location: Feybreak Tower 
‚Ä¢ Bjorn's appearance: A towering, broad-shouldered Nordic warrior in his late 50s with a frost-bitten blue scar across his left eye. Wears layered fur armor lined with Bastigor‚Äôs shed claws, ice-blue eyes, and a long silver beard. He has a long ponytail and blue scars across his arms.

7.content:
‚Ä¢ Faction: Pal Genetic Research Unit
‚Ä¢ Location: Pal Genetic Research Tower
‚Ä¢ Victor's appearance: Victor is a pale, thin man with a black and white wavy, shoulder length hair. His eyes are covered with a black blindfold. He wears a black high-collared long coat with golden topstitching and a triangle shaped button. A badge is displayed on the left side of his coat. The coat has a waist belt hanging from both sides that ends with belt ornaments. He also wears black gloves that cover his hands and black boots.
